Ichigo was preparing for another day at school, ready to bash Keigo if he was annoying, enjoy lunch with his friends, and possibly dash out of class to stop a few Hollows. What he wasn't expecting, was to run into a giant bare foot. Ichigo crashed head long into it as it suddenly appeared in front of him. Shaking his head he was shocked as he saw the foot in plain view. Standing up next to it he saw he was just slightly bigger than the big toe. Looking up past the ankle Ichigo saw the huge pillar like leg disappear into massive blue shorts that could house a circus and past an equally huge white shirt before resting on the giant's grinning face. It was that brat from Urahara's shop! Ichigo stared up at the humongous boy, wondering what the hell was going on!

"Hey there little carrot top! Heading to school?" Jinta asked.

"W-what the hell happened to you? How did you get so big?"

"That's the least of your concerns right now little bug. You're coming with me."

Before Ichigo could even think of protesting, Jinta reached down and wrapped his tree like fingers around Ichigo's comparatively tiny body. Ichigo struggled to escape the tight grasp but found it to be useless. Standing to his full height Jinta noticed that, even though it was early morning, he was starting to attract attention. He needed to find a more private place. He snapped his fingers thunderously as an idea came to him. He knew the perfect place!

Heading back to the ruins of Urahara's shop, Jinta pushed aside the debris with his toes until he found what he was looking for. There was a small trap door in the floor, leading down into Urahara's secret bunker. Leaning down, he shoved his index finger down the hole, shattering the door and leaving a large hole in the ground. Lifting up his foot he slammed it down on the small hole, completely obliterating the ground. After this was done he dropped Ichigo down into the bunker and prepared to lower himself in.

For Ichigo, it was a nightmare. He fell down, down, down, and would have shattered his body if he hadn't thought fast and went into Soul Reaper form. Catching his now prone body, he managed to land lightly on the ground by jumping off the towering cliffs. When his feet reached ground he set his body down and looked up to see what Jinta was doing. All he saw was the sole of a massive foot coming straight for him!

"Aw, crap!"

Ichigo grabbed his body again and ran like a bat out of hell, pushing himself as hard as he could to avoid being crushed like a bug under this over sized kid's foot. He barely managed to avoid death as the foot landed with an earth shaking thud. Ichigo was thrown off his feet by the wind created by the foot combined with the rumbling ground. Panting, he stared up while laying on his back and saw Jinta's other foot land a ways away, feeling the ground vibrate from the impact. The rest of his body was lowered with into the hole, the top part of his spiky red hair sticking out of the hole. Before turning his attention to Ichigo, he stood on his tip toes and reached over to the nearby houses. He grabbed one and it twisted apart in his grasp, leaving only the roof and a few splinters. He set the debris around the hole until it was concealed from sight. All anyone would see was a ruin. No one would disturb him and his new little toy.

With this accomplished, Jinta bent over and scanned the ground looking for Ichigo. He was no where in sight. A feral grin spread across the boy's face.

"So you want to play games huh? Well that's fine with me! Ready or not, here I come bug boy!"

Ichigo heard the booming voice of the boy from his hiding place inside a small cave. He had to avoid Jinta at all costs until he could escape and find help. Urahara had to be somewhere else beside the shop or this would have already been taken care of. The only question was, could Ichigo escape? Or would he be found?

Jinta stood up to his full height, his red spikes flattened slightly by the ceiling, and made his way over to the hole. Just as he was about to hoist himself out of hidden room he remembered Ichigo in his fist.

"Hmm...it would be a pain in the ass to carry you everywhere. But if I leave you free in my pocket or something you'll probably escape. Oh! I've got it!"

Ichigo didn't know what Jinta had planned but he knew it couldn't be good. He watched as the titanic boy scanned the remains of the shop looking for something. After about two minutes of searching he found what he was looking for. He opened his fist allowing Ichigo to stand on his palm and dangled a rope in front of him. Ichigo instantly shook his head and said, "No way! You are not tying me up!"

"Oh yes I am! You're going to get tied somewhere on my body so you don't get any funny ideas about escaping. I've got two places picked out for you. First, you can spend more time with my foot as I tie you to my toe. But if you want a break from them for awhile I could just use you as a necklace. So, what will it be? You've got thirty seconds before I choose for you!"

Ichigo weighed both options in his mind. If he was tied to the foot again he would have to endure a sweaty torture as Jinta stomped around his city. He would be relatively safe tied down to the toes but if Jinta kicked he could be crushed or have something collapse on him. If he chose the necklace then he'd be safer than on the foot out of the direct path of Jinta's destruction. However, he would also be hundreds of feet in the air, swinging precariously on a piece of old rope. If the rope snapped, he would likely be a pancake on the ground. If the rope snapped and he somehow managed to not hit the ground he would be loose on a part of Jinta's body which would be even more dangerous.

"Better hurry up carrot top! Ten seconds!" Jinta cut into Ichigo's thoughts with a malicious grin.

Damn, which one? What should Ichigo choose?
152212221.title: Preparing for a Day on the Town

choices: Jinta rounds up some more toys to play with.
Jinta rampages some more.
1522122212.content:
“Ugh…you’re necklace!” Ichigo replied, making a quick decision. It seemed like the safest choice. He wouldn’t get caught in any destruction Jinta made. Plus, if the rope did fail, he would at least have a chance to save himself from plummeting to his death.

“Okay, good choice. I don’t usually wear accessories, but I’ll make an exception for you, carrot top.” Jinta chuckled as he slid the rope under Ichigo’s arms and tied a knot around his torso. He held his new “necklace” by its two ends and admired it in front of his boyish face. After smiling with approval, he brought the two ends of the rope behind his neck and tied them together. Ichigo was swung through the air before he crashed into the young boy’s chest, getting a face-full of his white shirt.

Once his new toy was safely secured, Jinta wasted no time in punching away the debris he had used to cover the hole in the ceiling. He grabbed the edges of the gap and hoisted himself up through any remaining rubble. Once he was outside, he immediately noticed a crowd that had gathered around the ruins of the shop. To them it appeared as if a red-haired behemoth had broken its way through the earth’s surface. Once Jinta had lifted himself completely out of the secret room, he stood up to his full height and breathed in the fresh air. He then looked down at the onlookers and waved, smiling innocently.

“Hey there. Sorry for the mess, couldn’t really help it.”

The townsfolk stared at the giant for a few moments in disbelief. The silence was broken when they erupted into screams and scattered in a panic. Jinta just shrugged.

“Tough crowd.” he muttered before making his way forward. The people below franticly tried to get out of the way before they ended up squashed under the kid’s soles. Ichigo could do nothing but watch and hope everyone got out of the way quickly. A man who was driving down the street stopped when he saw the approaching boy and fled his car. Jinta’s bare foot pressed down on the automobile and easily flattened it into scrap metal. When he lifted his foot back up, the car remained stuck to his sole for a few steps before finally falling off in a heap of ruined metal.

Jinta didn’t really know where to go. He just wanted to stir up some chaos, so he decided the easiest way was to just trek forward. The boy folded his arms behind his head, closed his eyes, and relaxed as he allowed his feet to take him forward. There wasn’t like there was a wall he was going to bump into.

However, he did bump into a wall. Several of them. Jinta’s feet walked through one house after another, not worrying about any people that may have been in them. He tore through several blocks in only a couple minutes. Jinta’s simple walk was like a tornado to the unexpecting town below. To Ichigo, it was like a ride from hell. Every step made him lurch forward, only to be tossed back into Jinta’s gigantic form. When Jinta felt like he had walked enough, he turned around to inspect his work. A clearly visible path of destruction was visible , cutting though shops and homes. Flattened cars, trees, and other junk had been left in Jinta’s wake.

“Awesome.” was all the chaotic kid could say. “It felt like I was walking through grass.” Jinta’s gaze turned from the destruction he caused to Ichigo. “Still hanging in there, carrot top? You’re a shitty Soul Reaper, but you make a pretty good necklace.” The red-haired boy pulled on Ichigo a few times to make sure the rope was still tight before turning back to the town. Karakura Town was a big place, so there was still a lot more to do.
1522122212.title: Bird's-Eye View

choices: The police try to attack Jinta. It...doesn't go well
Jinta finds another game to play with the city
15221222122.content:
"I got a great idea! I'm going to test my strength!"

Ichigo looked up in horror as he heard this. It was bad enough when the giant boy had just been walking. Now he was going to actively devastate the city? This wasn't going to end well. In addition, Ichigo could feel bruises starting to form along his body where he had continually crashed into Jinta's chest. It was like getting thrown over and over again into a concrete wall. Reaching down Jinta flicked Ichigo, as though he could read Ichigo's mind.

"I know what you're thinking bug boy. You really need to stop complaining about what your master does. Instead, think about how you're going to serve me when I get tired."

Ichigo considered shouting back and insulting the boy, but then he remembered how easily Jinta could smash him under his feet or, he shuddered to think, swallow him whole. Jinta laughed and stood tall with his hands on his hips, surveying the land. What would be a good challenge for him? He decided to start small and work his way up. He stomped over to a house and put his foot on top of it.

"Let's see how much force it takes to crush this house!"

Jinta slowly started applying pressure. Instantly he could hear and feel the house start to splinter under his foot. He added a little more pressure and could hear objects falling and crashing inside the house followed by the sounds of the support snapping. Getting bored with taking his time he put his foot down and the whole structure instantly shattered under his foot.

"Not even close to being a challenge! What's next?"

He walked over to a much larger building next, one that reached his knees. He looked down at Ichigo and said, "What do you think tiny? How many kicks will it take to destroy this building?"

"Shut the hell up and leave me out of this!" Ichigo spat back.

Jinta flicked him again and said, "One more outburst like that and you're riding inside my shirt for the rest of the day. I'm warning you, it'll probably get sweaty in there. Plus, if you fall off I might not notice and squish you. You don't want to be a stain under your god's foot do you?"

"Oh, so he's a god now?" Ichigo muttered spitefully, making sure that Jinta didn't hear. He didn't like the idea of riding inside the boy's shirt.

"So? How many?"

"I don't know...five."

Jinta grinned and said, "Watch it fall in two!"

Rearing back as far as he could Jinta smashed his bare foot through the glass front of the building. It instantly shattered, half of it collapsing to the ground. Countless people could have been inside, but from his vantage point Ichigo couldn't tell. The Soul Society could be having a major influx of souls after the day was over...

True to his word, with the second kick Jinta leveled the building. He laughed and ground the debris into the ground even further. "Pathetic!"

Jinta crossed his arms and looked around. He smiled widely as his eyes landed on the biggest building in the city. It was a few (relative) feet bigger than Jinta and slightly wider. He stretched his arms and rolled his shoulder as he looked around for something to make this particular bit of destruction more fun. He saw another building nearby that was just about the right size. He grabbed the base of it and hoisted it whole out of the ground. This building was made of sterner stuff than the others and didn't instantly fall apart in his hands. Gripping the base of it he held it in a classic batter stance and said, "And the stadium goes silent as Jinta steps up to the plate!"

This was, of course, not even close to being true as the people of the city were in mass panic, running every which way to avoid getting smashed under the giant's foot or by debris caused by the giant's rampage. Ichigo rolled his eyes as he heard the boy's make believe. This was just getting worse every second.

"The pitcher looks scared as Jinta glares fiercely at him. It looks like it's going to be another home run folks!"

He pulled the building back and said, "Here's the pitch! It's a fastball headed straight towards Jinta! He pulls back on the bat and..."

Jinta swung with full force, the smaller building smashing through the larger one. Half the building crashed down into the lower half of it, causing the whole structure to collapse. Tossing the smaller building up into the air he cheered, "The crowd goes wild! No one can compare to Jinta!"

The smaller building crashed down onto a grouping of smaller buildings as well as a section of the road. Several people who had been fleeing in that direction stopped dead in their tracks and immediately headed in a different direction. Jinta, meanwhile was thinking of other ways he could have fun. Ichigo swung morosely from his rope prison and wondered what the kid would do next.
15221222122.title: Rampaging Red Head

choices: "Into the shirt you go!"
"Actually, I know another place you can go."
152212221221.content:
“Now, I think next I’ll…” Jinta began to say when suddenly he was distracted by a soft popping noise. He listened closer and noticed their were several of them. The giant looked around for the source until his eyes fell upon the road behind him. Three patrol cars and around six cops were shooting at him. They had actually been attacking him for a couple minutes, but Jinta just now noticed them. The police were shooting blindly; some hit Jinta’s arm while others hit his back. No matter where they struck, though, they simply bounced off Jinta’s concrete-like skin. The god of a boy smirked at the bug’s futile attempts.

“Wow, what a surprise.” Jinta said in a loud, deep voice. He turned around to face the cops and put his hands on his hips. The men immediately stopped firing when they were met with the giant’s gaze. They all froze up with fear. “You’re a bunch of nasty cops, aren’t you? Shooting at me like that, even though I’m just a kid! You need to be taught a lesson.” Jinta turned around again so the cops were once again looking at the giant’s back. They thought he was leaving for some reason and were about to take this chance to flee. Jinta has other plans, though, as he bent his knees and started to fall back. The police looked up in terror as Jinta’s jean-clad butt descended down upon them. They didn’t even have the chance to scream before the ass hit the pavement with an earth-shattering boom. The force of the impact shattered windows of any nearby buildings that were still standing. Jinta grinned toothily as he swerved his butt back and forth. Metal and humans alike were ground up until neither was recognizable. Jinta picked himself back onto his feet and inspected the ground. A clean imprint of his butt had been grounded into the road. The sight made Jinta crack up.

“I guess they learned their lesson!” Jinta exclaimed through his laughing. Using his hand to brush away the debris on is butt, the boy was about to walk away when he heard yet another sound bothering him. This time a buzzing noise. “What now?” Jinta looked in the direction of the bothersome noise to see a police helicopter hovering by his head. The copter tried to back off, but a giant hand stopped it in its place. The spinning blades were brought to a screeching halt by the boy’s tree-like fingers. Jinta peered into the flying machine to see two people: the pilot and another cop holding something that looked like a sniper rifle. The man with the gun opened the window and started shooting at Jinta’s face. A pointless effort.

“You just don’t learn, do ya? What am I going to do with you?” Jinta looked around for a moment until he spotted a tall building in the distance. The red head gripped the copter in his hand as he got into a pitching position. His eyes were locked onto the distant building.

“Once again the stadium is quiet as Jinta is about to throw his third ball to home plate. The top-batter on the opponent’s side has two strikes. One more and he’s out!”

The muscles in Jinta’s arms tensed up as he got ready to throw. The cops inside the helicopter, who could hear everything, tried desperately to get out. Unfortunately, Jinta’s fingers were blocking the door.

“Time itself stops for this one moment. Jinta Hanakari gives the frightened batter one last smile before…HE THROWS!”

With that said, Jinta uses every ounce of his strength to throw the helicopter through the air like a baseball. Soon after leaving the giant’s hands, the vehicle exploded into a burning fireball. The fireball smacked into the building ahead and burst out from the other side. Jinta watched as the entire building caught on fire and slowly burned to the ground. The merciless titan pumped his fist into the air.

“Strike three! He’s OUT! Once again, Jinta is superior to everyone!”

Ichigo, who had been watching everything in shock, gritted his teeth in anger. There was no way he could watch all this and remain silent!

“Did your growth spurt ruin your mind?!” Ichigo shouted up at his captor. Jinta, who was surprised to hear Ichigo talk back to him again, looked down at him. Did he not just warn him a few minutes ago? “Those are people you killed!”

“Hey, don’t blame me.” Jinta replied simply. “They attacked me first. It was self defense.”

“Why you…” The Soul Reaper’s eye twitched in anger.

“Now, what did I say about those outbursts?” Jinta asked as he flicked Ichigo against his chest. “I warned you, buggy.”
152212221221.title: Crime Doesn't Pay...Unless You're Jinta

choices: Ichigo manages to free himself and cling to Jinta's body looking for an escape
The army reinforcements arrive...
1522122212211.content:
"Into the shirt you go!"

Ichigo, deciding that since he was already being punished anyway, screamed curses at Jinta as his tree trunk like fingers gripped him tightly and raised him slowly into the air. Clearly Jinta was savoring these moments. With his other hand the massive boy pulled down the collar of his shirt and dangled Ichigo in front of his face.

"Have fun down there Substitute Insect!"

Without further ado Ichigo dropped into the semi dark recesses of enlarged cotton and human flesh. Jinta let the collar go and Ichigo was left alone. He wiggled around slightly to check the durability of the rope. Luckily they were still holding. When he was dropped he had bounced slightly when the rope reached its full length. He was worried that the tension might have weakened the rope. Now that he was sure he wasn't going to suddenly plunge to what could be his doom he took stock of his situation. Since Jinta was wearing a white shirt the daylight was filtering through it somewhat giving enough light for Ichigo to see. Below him he could make out the long expanse of flesh that was Jinta's stomach, completely uninterrupted except for a, relatively, small hole that was his navel. The street was visible below that along with buildings and the constantly shifting mass that was Jinta's legs and feet. Looking up, Ichigo could see Jinta's face staring straight ahead, occasionally looking down with a devilish smirk to survey the damage he was causing. Jinta had been right before. The air was distinctly warmer, the somewhat musky smell relieved by the occasional stray breeze that wafted up through the boy's shirt. Already he could feel beads of sweat forming on his forehead while his back was starting to moisten thanks to the sweat on Jinta's chest. Clearly he was exerting himself in his fun. Now every time he flew back and smacked into Jinta's head a wet plopping sound was heard accompanied by a small splash of sweat. It was sickening to Ichigo. He was already regretting his previous outburst.

Meanwhile, as Ichigo suffered even more in his captivity, Jinta was continuing his jaunt around town. The police had wised up and realized there was no way they could possibly stop Jinta with conventional weapons. So they had contacted the nearest army base and were awaiting major reinforcements. While they waited for these reinforcements to arrive they had set up several bombs in strategic locations around the city. Hopefully these would be enough to slow the giant down.

Sadly their efforts were in vain as Jinta stepped on the first trap. The bomb exploded around his feet and went completely unnoticed. Jinta didn't even feel a tickle. When the next trap went off around his knees he still didn't notice it. Thus far all the police had accomplished was destroying more of the city. When the third bomb went off somewhere around Jinta's waist he finally took notice of them. He looked down in surprise at wreckage he didn't cause and his face darkened in anger.

"Hey, who the hell is destroying things behind my back? This is my city to play with!"

Ichigo fumed at hearing these words but kept his lip zipped. If he was too outspoken again he might very well end up someplace worse than this. Jinta bent down over the newly made wreckage and scanned it for anyone or anything that might have destroyed it. When he saw the twisted remains of the bombs he raised an eyebrow quizzically.

"Who puts bombs inside an office building? That's just stupid!"

Crawling over to a different office building he looked it over to see if there was a bomb in it as well. As his fingers trailed over the fourth story windows an explosion erupted, blasting the windows out and sending the first four floors plummeting to the ground along with several of the floors above it. Jinta grinned and said, "Oh man. Were these supposed to hurt me? That's hilarious!"

Jinta rose to his feet again, dusting off his hands and still chuckling at the efforts of the bugs below him. When would they learn to just accept their new god? Oh well. They'd learn in time. Meanwhile there was still more fun to be had! Jinta shielded his eyes so he could see better and scanned the landscape around him. What would be a good place to have fun in next? The city was starting to show that it was currently housing a giant, with destroyed buildings everywhere, smoke rising from the ruins, people still screaming and running, cars causing build ups in the streets as they strove to escape, and the occasional police megaphone blaring, "Don't panic! The situation is under control!"

Jinta chuckled at that last statement. There was nothing that could control him. Nothing.
1522122212211.title: Ichigo's Punishment in 100% Cotton

choices: Ichigo hears the boy's stomach rumble. Jinta looks for something to eat.
Ichigo gets lodged in Jinta's navel.
15221222122111.content:
Ichigo wiped away the sweat on his forehead and groaned in discomfort. If it wasn’t for the occasional cool breeze, it’d be like an oven in here. He was supposed to stay in here for the entire day? He’d probably suffocate before then! As he was trying to figure a way out of this deathtrap, he suddenly noticed the rope wasn’t as tight around his waist as before. The humid air combined with the perspiration of the two males must have started to loosen it. This was both a good thing and bad. On the bright side, he’d finally be free and didn’t have to be this oversize brat’s accessory anymore. However, he’d also lose the only thing keeping him from freefalling down the boy’s clothes. Fate didn’t give him much time to go over the situation as the knot untied itself and freed the teen’s body. Ichigo thought fast and grabbed the rope with both hands to stop his fall.

“Come on, upper body strength, don’t fail me now!”

The Substitute Insect pulled himself onto the rope and sat on the loop, similar to the makeshift swings he used to play on when he was younger. Once he was balanced and certain he wasn’t going to slip off, Ichigo started to survey the space around him. Escape was his priority and now was as good as a chance as any. He tried to look for a hole or rip in the white fabric he could climb through. After all the destruction he had caused and those bombs, surely his clothes must have suffered somehow. To Ichigo’s surprise, there wasn’t a tear to be found. Whatever had made this kid so big not only increased the resistance of his skin, but also his clothes. The only thing that could harm them now was probably Jinta himself.

With that option gone, Ichigo decided the only way out was to climb out. Climbing up would be a mistake since Jinta would spot him easily, so down was the only way. He’d climb down to the boy’s jeans, descend those, and then hop off next time it was safe. Ichigo thought about climbing down the boy’s body, but quickly dismissed that idea with a quick feel of the boy’s chest. It was way too hard to grip and its sweaty surface would bring about an uncontrollable slide down. Ichigo finally decided to climb down the shirt instead.

Readying himself, Ichigo jumped toward the infinite whiteness in front of him and grabbed handfuls of the cotton. Hoping Jinta didn’t notice the loss of weight around his neck, Ichigo started the slow climb down the long expanse of the young giant’s shirt. Every now and then the wind would push Jinta’s shirt against his skin and brush Ichigo against the god’s torso, covering him in more sweat and musk. The Soul Reaper tried to ignore it and focused on reaching the boy’s pants.
15221222122111.title: Poor Climbing Conditions

choices: Ichigo manages to get free...because Jinta starts growing again!
Jinta gets some food while Ichigo tries to come up with a plan
152212221221112.content:
Slowly, very slowly, Ichigo was making his way down the inside of the titan's shirt. It was harder going than he had expected and he was starting to get tired. But thoughts of what would happen to him if Jinta caught him trying to escape gave him renewed stamina and he kept going. There were a couple of scare points when his sweaty grip weakened and he slid down the shirt before getting a good grip again, and another when he was slammed against Jinta's belly and he nearly stuck to it thanks to all the sweat on both bodies. Luckily he had persevered. The pants were getting closer and closer. Within a few minutes he would be clinging to the boy's jean shorts waistband. From there it would be a short trip to the bottom of the shorts and from there just a heart stopping slid down the boy's leg before reaching the foot. Once he was back on solid ground he was heading immediately to find Rukia so they could get in contact with the Soul Society for some much needed assistance.

But luck had finally run out for Ichigo. Halfway down the stomach, when he was only a short climb to the waistband, a particularly strong gust of wind plastered Jinta's shirt against his stomach. This would have just been a time like any other except for the fact that Ichigo was positioned directly in front of the mountainous boy's navel. Before he knew what was happening he was crammed inside it. He went in butt first, his back bending him almost totally in half, a supremely uncomfortable position. With a little maneuvering he managed to get onto his side, curled up in a ball with his legs over his head.

"Dammit! I was so close!" Ichigo cursed, trying to wiggle free from his new prison.

Unfortunately Ichigo was well stuck thanks to the relatively small size of the navel, Ichigo's current position, and the sweat actively gluing him in place. The only good thing Ichigo could think about this was, if Jinta saw that he escaped but got crammed into his navel, Jinta would find the whole situation hilarious. Which was rather like choosing your method of execution. Either way, no one but the guy in charge is getting a good deal. Suddenly a dark rumbling sound surrounded Ichigo.

"W-what the hell was that?" Ichigo wondered trying to look around him.

Suddenly a massive hand patted the stomach, rubbing it slightly. "Looks like I'm hungry little man."

There was silence as though Jinta was waiting for a response of some kind. "Finally learned your place, huh, buggy boy? Well that suits me fine. Maybe if you keep playing nice I'll let you out!"

Ichigo knew that he had to get out of here before that happened or he would be back in the giant's clutches. But what could he do?
152212221221112.title: Major Detour

choices: Ichigo calls for help.
Jinta burps loudly, which causes Ichigo to drop the cell phone.
1522122212211122.content:
All this playing had gotten Jinta hungry. At times like this, he would usually steal some money from Ururu and go buy a big burger and some ice cream. Now, however, a burger and ice cream wouldn’t be enough to satisfy him by themselves. Fortunately, he didn’t have to worry about money! The entire town would supply him with his meal. Looking around, Jinta spotted a popular bakery shop and decided to start there.

“Sweet.“ the giant roared, pun not intended. The hungry giant stomped over the building, grabbed the edges of its roof, and easily ripped it off. Tossing the mass behind him, Jinta bent down and got a closer look at the inside. Any customers or employers inside stared up at the boy in amazement.

“I heard you were having a special today. ‘Give All Your Food To God Jinta’ Day!” Jinta snickered as he lowered one of his enormous hands into the shop. Everyone screamed and rushed for the exits. Jinta ignored them and fixed his attention on the many racks of donuts, bagels, cakes, and bread. He gripped one of the racks and tore it off the wall. The rack of food was brought up to Jinta’s mouth as his lips parted to allow all the sweets to be deposited inside. Jinta moaned as he chewed the serving, getting a mouthful of flavor. After swallowing, he moved onto another rack and did the same. When all the racks were empty, the giant’s lips were coated in sugar, but his stomach still wasn’t satisfied. The red-haired kid tore into the back of the shop to find several boxes full of more treats, which he happily gulped down.

Meanwhile, Ichigo listened to the giant above as he ate. He hoped it wasn’t people he was enjoying, and the lack of screams told him it wasn’t. That didn’t matter, though. He had to get out of here fast before Jinta found him. He struggled to pull himself out, but Jinta’s navel refused to let him go. He started to pant loudly as any hope of escape seemed to go up in smoke.

“Okay…just calm down, Kurosaki.” Ichigo muttered to himself as he tried to regain control of his breathing. “You’ve been in a lot of tight situations before. There’s always a way out…just think!”

Ichigo squeezed his eyes shut as his mind worked fiercely to come up with a solution. He tried to ignore the sounds of Jinta gorging himself, because it wasn’t helping. A light bulb suddenly lit up in his head.

“Hold on a sec!” Ichigo shouted to himself. The high-school student used one of his hands to dig into his left pocket. Nothing. He tried his right. Eureka, his cell phone! Ichigo grabbed it tightly in his fist and brought it up to his face.

“I completely forgot I had this! Why didn’t I think of this sooner! So stupid!” Ichigo cursed himself, but didn’t spent much time on it. Resolving is present situation was the only thing he had to worry about. He’d just call Rukia and get her to send Soul Society to help him.

Outside the shirt, Jinta had finished putting the bakery shop out of business and stomped over it, crushing it into the ground. In front of him was a fast food joint, which he greedily tore into to continue his feast. Inside he found heaps of fries and burgers which he scooped up. In the back he also spotted a canister of cola.

“Perfect, I was getting thirsty.” Jinta tore the canister from the floor, ripped its top open, and began chugging it down. When he was done, he clenched the canister in his fist and crushed it into a ball before throwing it over his shoulder.
1522122212211122.title: Ordering Takeout

choices: The army finally arrives to attack Jinta
Jinta's getting bored. He goes looking for more toys.
15221222122111222.content:
Ichigo had managed to dial about three numbers when a huge groaning sound filled the area directly to the right of him, deep within Jinta's belly. He stopped for a second and listened as the groaning growling sound made its way up through Jinta's body until it filled his mouth. Jinta smacked his lips a few times before opening his mouth wide to allow the belch to rip its way out of the bowels of his body. The force of the burp was so great that Ichigo could feel it vibrating through his whole body. Before he knew what was happening his cellphone vibrated right out of his grip and fell towards the ground. Ichigo watched in horror as he saw the small electronic object flip slowly end over end until it disappeared from his view. No matter where it landed it could no longer help him. This was the last straw. Ichigo's blank stare of horror changed into a look of pure rage. Next thing he knew he was throwing a world class fit. Forcing his body left and right, waving his arms as much as he could, kicking what he could reach, Ichigo let loose a steady stream of curses until he was completely out of breath. His last hope was now smashed on the ground. His last hope was that Urahara returned soon or Rukia became aware of the danger and realized he was incapacitated.

Outside the navel Jinta was looking curiously down at his stomach. After he had burped he could have sworn he felt a weird tickling sensation in his belly button.

"What was that? A bug or some...thing..."

Jinta instantly plunged his hand down the front of his shirt and grabbed the rope that was supposed to be tying down his bug buddy. He pulled the rope out and was shocked to see it empty. Jinta stomped over to the nearest building he could find and dropped to his knees. The windows were extremely reflective, like a giant mirror. Lifting up his shirt Jinta looked around his navel and just managed to see Ichigo crammed in there. He snorted a little before bursting out in gales of laughter. This was all too much!

"Well, well bug. Looks like you tried to escape and got stuck. That's just fine with me. You can finish your punishment in there!"

Suddenly Ichigo had an idea. "No wait! Don't leave me in here! I'm sorry for what I said!"

Jinta stopped lowering his shirt and said, "What was that insect?"

Ichigo gritted his teeth at the insult and replied, "I said I'm sorry! Don't keep me in here!"

Jinta grinned wickedly and said, "Aw, that's cute. You're begging me for forgiveness! I suppose I can be forgiving just this once. Next time though you might find yourself inside my belly instead of just stuck in it so don't mouth off!"

Jinta lowered his fingers to his navel and started pressing around the edge of it. It took a few seconds but Ichigo eventually popped out into Jinta's waiting fingers. Jinta raised his palm to his face and said, "Don't get your hopes up too high slave. I'm still tying you back up."

Ichigo had seen this coming. But at least he wasn't trapped inside a sweaty hell with the danger of suffocation. Jinta grabbed the loop of rope in his other hand and set Ichigo down on top of a nearby building, using his palm as a backdrop to prevent Ichigo from running. He grabbed the rope in both hands and started wrapping them around Ichigo. Soon, Ichigo was bound like a caterpillar in a cocoon with a long strand of it coming off his back. Jinta tied this long strand into a loop and raised it up to his ear. He fit the loop around his ear and tightened it until Ichigo was swinging a few, relative, inches below the earlobe.

"There you go! You made a crappy necklace so lets see how you do as a earring."

“Sorry, I was just taking a walk along your body. Hope you don’t mind.”

“Oh? Did you like what you saw?” Jinta joked as he leaned up. His chest lifted at an angle, causing Ichigo to slide toward the giant’s stomach again. “Oops.” Jinta caught Ichigo in his hand and brought him up to his face. “Sorry about that.”

“It’s okay, it’s my fau--” Ichigo was suddenly distracted when he noticed his god’s new “accessory” around his wrist. The figure looked familiar to the Substitute Soul Reaper. “Hey…aren’t you Hisagi?”

“You know this bug, carrot top?”

“Yeah…sort of. He’s the Vice-Captain of the…um…7th Division?”

“Ugh…9th.” Hisagi corrected. The youthful Soul Reaper began coughing, having had his face buried in Jinta’s hair for the past few hours.

“Another Vice-Captain, eh? What’s with Soul Society and sending all their high ranking members to me?” Jinta pondered as he grabbed his wrinkled up shirt and stood up. After placing Ichigo in his pants pocket, Jinta slipped is shirt back over his body and took a look around. “Hey, carrot top, what time is it?”

Ichigo climbed up Jinta’s pocket and leaned himself over the edge. The teen took a look at his watch before answering his god’s question.

“IT’S A FEW MINUTES PAST ONE!” Ichigo yelled up at Jinta so he could hear him clearly.

“That’s it? There’s still the entire afternoon to play around.” The titan brought his wrist up to his eyes and grinned at Hisagi. “So, my new slave, what should we do first? I could always start breaking you in…”
152212221221112221121111111221.title: Ichigo wakes up before Jinta and wanders around...

choices: Jinta starts breaking Hisagi in.
Something interupts him.
1522122212211122211211111112211.content:
Before Hisagi could say anything in response to Jinta's question of what to do first a low rumbling sound like distant thunder filled the air. Jinta patted his stomach and said, "Well I guess that answers my question. Time to find some grub!"

Hisagi looked around as best he could. There wasn't anything edible in sight. How much food would be required to fill this god like boy's belly anyway? Jinta seemed to be thinking the same thing as he started walking towards a less desolated area of the city. The buildings here were still standing relatively well but Jinta saw to it that they didn't stay that way. Just walking was enough to demolish the smaller ones as Jinta's steps were like miniature earthquakes. The larger ones had the honor of being smashed beneath the boy's sole. Hisagi, who hadn't been monitoring the situation as thoroughly as certain other Soul Reapers, was shocked by Jinta's callous disregard for human life. Ichigo, on the other hand, had his arms crossed over the edge of the pocket and was resting his chin on them, watching his god walk with a neutral expression on his face. He had an idea of what Jinta was going to do next and knew that he should care but he couldn't. Lesser beings had to be sacrificed so that Jinta could continue to flourish as a god. Finally, Jinta arrived at the edge of town where hundreds of cars were attempting to flee the city and were caught in a traffic jam. Horns were honking and people were screaming as Jinta's massive shadow fell over all of them. Jinta shook his head with a smile on his face at the antics of the bugs beneath him.

"I think it's adorable you insects think you can just escape from me. You should know better. You can't leave when you need to serve your god."

With that statement the boy reached down and scooped up about ten cars in his palm. With a devilish grin he opened his mouth wide and dropped them all inside. It would take far too long to try and empty the cars first to get at the people. It would be simpler to just devour them metal, rubber, and all. All it took was a few quick chews to decimate the vehicles before the whole mass was swallowed. Jinta then reached down and grabbed two more handfuls, stuffing them greedily in his mouth. Hisagi was sickened by this whole process mostly by the fact that Jinta was eating living humans but also because, being connected to the boy's wrist, he was rapidly moving up and down. It was like being trapped on a hellish amusement park ride. Ichigo was scanning the ground as Jinta ate, making sure no one got away before his master was done eating. A fleeing group of individuals caught his eye and he pointed them out and shouted, "LORD JINTA! TEN OF THEM ARE TRYING TO ESCAPE DOWN THAT ALLEY!"

Jinta jerked his head in the direction that his slave was pointing and saw them. A few quick steps was all it took before the group was in his hands.

"Nice try bugs! You can't get away that easily!"

He stuffed them all in his mouth, which didn't even fill it, and swallowed them whole. Jinta burped slightly and sighed happily. He patted his pocket gently and said, "Good work carrot top. Keep an eye out for any others that try to escape okay?"

"I'LL DO MY BEST LORD JINTA!" Ichigo shouted back, pleased that his master had paid him a compliment. Out of the corner of his eye he noticed another bakery. He tore off the roof and gathered up some baked goods which he dropped into the pocket Ichigo was in.

"You must be hungry little guy. Eat that when I'm done here." Jinta instructed.

Ichigo nodded knowing that his master knew he would obey. Jinta turned his attention back to the fleeing morsels at his feet and continued his buffet. Car after car disappeared into the boy god's gullet along with whatever person tried to make a break for it. Ichigo helped him to devour about fifty people before he was finally full. A loud burp rocketed through the city as Jinta patted his full stomach.

"That was great! Even better than my first feast!"

"MAY I PLEASE EAT MY FOOD NOW LORD JINTA?" Ichigo asked obediently.

Jinta smiled at his little slave and nodded. Ichigo smiled back and dropped into the pocket to eat the various breads, muffins, cakes, and other baked goods that were pooled at the bottom of the boy's pocket. As his obedient slave ate Jinta turned his attention to his new slave.

"So 69 face we can do this the easy way or the hard way. Are you going to submit and be my slave or am I going to have to condition you?"

Hisagi took a deep breath and shouted, "I'll never do anything you say you monster!"

"Huh, that sounds familiar. Where have I heard that before?" Jinta pretended to think hard. "Oh yeah! That's what Ichigo said in the beginning! And now look at him! He's helping me! Before long you'll be doing the same. So, does that change your mind? Last chance!"

Hisagi merely spit at Jinta, the small glob of saliva landing on Jinta's arm. Jinta wiped it away without a second though and said, "Good. I was hoping you'd be difficult. It's more fun breaking you little slaves."

Hisagi put on a brave face, but he knew that what was coming was going to be intense and horrifying.

15221222122111222112111111122111.content:
Jinta used his fingers to break the metal bracelet trapping Hisagi. He used the same fingers pluck the young man from his ruined bonds and bring him up to his master’s face.

“Let’s get started, shall we? You can start at the bottom like good, insignificant bug.” Jinta told the Vice-Captain before he lightly flicked him toward the street below. Hisagi flew through the air too fast and control himself and smacked right into the black concrete. The impact had pushed him deep into the ground, so it would take some effort to dislodge himself. Hisagi never had the opportunity, though, as a shadow suddenly covered him. The Soul Reaper looked up to see the giant brat’s foot descending on him. Unable to avoid the massive boyfoot, Hisagi could only lean back as far as he could to allow the foot to cover him. Much to Hisagi’s relief, the foot stopped just inches above his nose. If he leaned up even a little bit, his face would smack right into Jinta’s sweaty skin.

“Now that you’re in a fitting place, you can start licking. I don’t expect you to clean my foot while you’re like that, but I do expect you to lick until you’ve understood the superiority of it! If you refuse, which I know you’re thinking of doing, I’ll be smearing your remains off my foot!”

At first, Hisagi didn’t do anything. The thought of licking this monster’s foot was just too humiliating, and he was prepared to die the moment he joined Soul Society. However, this was different. He wouldn’t die on the battlefield protecting his comrades…he’d die under the foot of some cruel kid! It’d be a pointless and humiliating death. Hisagi decided to play along with the giant for now, if it meant avoiding such an end. He stuck out his tongue and began licking the bottom of Jinta’s foot. The first few licks were the worse, since he had to clean that spot of any dirt and rubble that had stuck to Jinta’s foot. The rest weren’t joyful either, but at least it was only sweat he was licking up. No matter how much he licked the same spot, however, the perspiration never seemed to end. The spot quickly produced more sweat each time Hisagi cleaned it. It didn’t take long until Hisagi was mentally wishing Jinta would take his foot away. It wasn’t until ten minutes later that he did.

“So, 69 man, how did your god’s foot taste?” Jinta asked as he took his foot away. Hisagi was quick to answer.

“Terrible!” he yelled up at Jinta as loud as he could. His tongue wasn’t in the best of health, so wasn’t able to speak very loudly or clearly. Jinta still seemed to get what he said, though.

“Wrong answer, bug boy!” Jinta grinned widely as he stomped the ground near Hisagi as hard as he could. The earth was completely obliterated and Hisagi was sent spiraling upward. Hisagi spun rapidly toward Jinta’s face, watching the boy’s massive body pass by him. Before he could pass the boy’s chest, Jinta’s palm appeared and whacked the Soul Reaper back toward Earth. The giant boy only used a small fraction of is strength, but to Hisagi it was like being punched by Captain Zaraki on a bad day. He once again smacked into the concrete, and this time his entire body was in pain. He couldn’t even gather the energy to stand up. It’s not like he had a chance, tough, since Jinta’s foot once again enveloped him.

“Now, do it again!” Jinta commanded from above. Hisagi’s only protest was a deep sigh of annoyance before he got to work again. Once again, the foul taste of dirt, grime, and preteen sweat haunted his taste buds. He could lick this sole for hours and he’d never get use to it. Hisagi wondered if submitting to Jinta affected the taste at all. Ichigo seemed like he’d take anything from Jinta and think it was a blessing from a higher power.

Another ten minutes later passed before Jinta took his foot away and asked Hisagi the same question as before. Hisagi thought about his answer a bit this time…

“It was…great. Best thing I ever tasted.” the Vice-Captain lied. Jinta knew he was lying through his teeth, but that didn’t bother him at all.

“That’s better. Since you like it so much, I’ll make a deal with you.” Jinta said to his lowly slave as he wiggled his toes. The gigantic digits tore at the road like it was Styrofoam. “Come over here and give both my feet some kisses. Show them how much you love them, insect. If you do, I‘ll let you ride on my shoulder.”

Hisagi was at a loss for words. This brat had just forced Hisagi to humiliate himself, and now he wanted him to do it willingly? There was no way…

“Of course, I’m just asking. You can refuse if you want. Heck, you can say no and I’ll still let you ride on my shoulder! However…I won’t help you get there.”

Hisagi had a puzzled expression on his face. He didn’t quite understand what Jinta meant by that.

“You get what I mean, little man? I’m saying that if you don’t kiss my feet, you’re going to have to climb up here yourself! And no walking on spirit particles, either! I’ll just smack you right back down like a mosquito.”

Hisagi took a moment to look over Jinta’s titanic form. He was just too big…it’d take forever to get that high! What if Jinta got bored and decided to take a walk? It’d make the trek even more dangerous. However, if Hisagi refused both proposals, Jinta would probably just walk pass him and leave him behind. Actually, the more accurate thing to say is that he’d walk ON him.
15221222122111222112111111122111.title: Being Jinta's Slave is Tough

choices: Jinta goes to a relatively undestroyed area and makes some mischief
Jinta wants to play a game with his slaves
152212221221112221121111111221111.content:
Hisagi knew that trying to climb up the massive boy would be suicide. And declining to do either would be officially signing his death warrant. So that left him with just the one option. He slowly approached the big toe of the left foot and leaned forward, his lips brushing against the sweaty, dirty skin. He pursed his lips and kissed the toe lightly. Jinta flicked his toe, hitting Hisagi in the face and adding to his growing list of cuts and bruises.

"No, no, little man! You're going to have to do better than that! Kiss all over the toe, every toe, and when you're done, kiss all over the top of the foot, and all over the side, and then I'll lift it up so you can get the bottom."

Hisagi growled in frustration, hating the condescension in the boy's voice, the way he knew that he was a god to everyone beneath him. But if he didn't do this it would the end of him. He was starting to get a feeling of what sort of tortures Ichigo must have gone through. He had lasted quite awhile. How long would Hisagi last? He bent down again and kissed the toe, moving in a line down to the ground before moving to the sides and heading in between the toes. Jinta pinched his toes together, pinning Hisagi.

"That's the idea slave! Just like that and you'll earn your seat up here!" He patted his shoulder and grinned.

The toes released the Vice Captain and allowed him to continue his worship. By the time he was done kissing the pinky toe his lips were already dry and chapped to go along with his sand papery tongue. Unfortunately he wasn't allowed to stop. If he held still for more than fifteen consecutive seconds Jinta would raise his foot and drop it, causing a small earthquake to erupt over the area, knocking Hisagi to his butt and reminding him of his task. Hisagi scrambled on top of the foot and, on his hands and knees, began kissing it all over, starting at the toes and making his way to the ankle. When he was done, Jinta lifted his foot and watched with a mean glee as the bug like Soul Reaper rolled down his foot and landed on his back on the hard concrete. He had no intentions of being gentle with this slave. At least, not until he showed the same devotion as Ichigo.

Ichigo himself was watching this whole show from the pocket, wondering why Hisagi was being so stubborn. He remembered that he had been like that once and all it had done was bring him pain and humiliation. He wanted to shout down to Hisagi to just give in. His life would be so much easier. Sure, he'd have to be a slave, but it was better to be a living slave than a dead bug right? Right. Ichigo looked up and smiled slightly at the face of his god and master. He looked like he was having such a good time. He really did enjoy what he was doing. Ichigo determined that he would help him continue having fun and helping him in any other ways he could. That would show him, no matter how insignificant he became, he could still be useful. It was his only chance for survival.

Back down below Hisagi was still diligently kissing Jinta's foot, his body covered in the debris of the slowly dying town and the sweat of the youthful god that he now served. His lips had gone numb from the constant contact with the foot so he could no longer feel the rough skin of the foot. It was a small comfort. With the foot finally totally serviced Hisagi stepped out from under it and sighed. Jinta tapped his foot impatiently and said, "Come on! Move on to the next one!"

Hisagi groaned and looked at the other foot. Just as huge, just as dirty, and just sweaty. It was he was in Hell, forced to perform the same task, over and over again for eternity. He forced himself to move closer to the big toe and start kissing it as well. Jinta nodded contentedly, knowing this was having an effect on the young Soul Reaper's psyche. With any luck he'd be broken faster than Ichigo.

Hisagi kissed and kissed and kissed, moving up down and around the toes until they were all covered again. Throwing himself on top of the foot he crawled again, the same path he took when he was on the opposite foot. Once he reached the top he knew he would be dumped onto the pavement and, sure enough, he was. He got to his feet before Jinta could order him to and continued kissing, starting at the rough heel and making his way up the foot. Jinta lowered it more and more so that Hisagi could reach all parts of the foot. Finally, with one last smooch, his work was done. He collapsed onto the pavement, his body weak from the constant physical torture and the worship session that had immediately followed. Jinta scooped him up in his hand and brought him up to his face.

"Not bad for a first try. You got nothing on carrot top though!" Jinta said.

"THANK YOU LORD JINTA!" Ichigo yelled up from his position in the pocket.

Jinta set Hisagi down on his left shoulder and said, "You can hang out there for awhile. Remember though, if you try to escape I'll know about it and you will be punished for it. Severely!"

Hisagi didn't bother replying. He was too wiped out from his exertions. Thoughts of escape were floating around under thoughts of just resting for awhile. The shoulder he was currently in a prone position on was large enough that he didn't have to worry about falling off unless Jinta forgot he was there so he closed his eyes and tried to block out what was happening to him and rest for what was sure to be more trying times in the future.
