1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
This was it. Jinta only had one shot at this. If he failed, it was all over for him. This Arrancar would probably tear him to shreds with a smile on his face. But there was no way Jinta would let that happen! He was the only god around here! And like a true god he would dispose of any usurpers and pretenders. Grimmjow was still a ways away. He was clearly taking his time, enjoying this game that was occurring between the two of them. Jinta quickly surveyed the area. He would wait until the time was right and then open a hole in space nearby.There was no way the Arrancar was going to fall for a trap, so he was going to have to physically shove him in. He could do it. He was God Jinta after all!

"You know kid, watching you destroy this town and enslave those pathetic Soul Reapers was really something. I can admit that. But, when we get right down to it, you're still just a bratty little kid! I'm going to enjoy ripping you to pieces!" Grimmjow said all this as soon as he was within talking distance. At the last word he suddenly charged forward and kicked Jinta. Jinta couldn't react fast enough and was sent flying away, tearing into the ground as he rolled.

"Damn...wasn't ready for that one..." Jinta muttered.

"You're so pathetic! Some god!" Grimmjow laughed and continued pursuing the boy.

Jinta waited until Grimmjow got close and then swiped at him with his reality warping powers. Grimmjow dodged at the last second and only ended up losing a chunk of his stomach. He didn't seem to notice it as it quickly reformed. He was about to kick Jinta again when Jinta altered gravity and his kick went far too high. Jinta took this opportunity to cut his other leg at the knee. Grimmjow quickly fell over, blood pouring from his wound, as Jinta jumped to his feet and began slicing chunks of the Arrancar off left and right. Soon, only a bloody pile was left on the ground. However, Jinta could already see the fleshy mass starting to reform. Jinta had done this on purpose. He knew it wouldn't keep the Arrancar down for long but he hoped it would make him angry enough to do something stupid...

Soon enough Grimmjow as getting to his feet, his normally white clothes stained with blood. He was absolutely furious.

"That's it...I'm done playing around with you kid! Now you're dead!"

He charged forward and Jinta quickly grabbed reality with both hands and tore downward. A huge hole ripped right in front of him. Grimmjow, not knowing what the strange void in front of him was, ran straight into it thinking it was an energy attack of some kind that he could just bat out of the way. He was shocked when he suddenly found himself in an infinite blackness that stretched into eternity. Jinta quickly recreated reality until only a small hole was left. He looked through it and laughed at Grimmjow.

"Some fighter you are! Falling for a simple trick like this! Now you're trapped forever in the space between reality!"

Grimmjow ran up to the hole and shouted, "You damn brat! Let me out of here! I'll kill you!"

Jinta laughed at him and said, "You're in no position to threaten me buddy! But look on the bright side. Maybe I'll come back for you...when I'm an even bigger, stronger, and totally unstoppable GOD!"

As he shouted god he slammed shut the hole in reality, trapping the impulsive Espada completely. Jinta dusted his hands and grinned at the empty space. His biggest challenge yet was now trapped in an empty, boundless void. This was just proof that nothing was greater than he was. No matter what rose to oppose him he would strike it down just like a true god would!

"Wow Lord Jinta that was amazing! I knew you could do it!" Ichigo praised his god from the pocket.

Jinta picked his obedient slave up and brought him to his face. "You served your god well carrot top! That idea was perfect!"

Ichigo blushed and stuttered, "I-I just thought it might work...my idea would have been pointless if you weren't so powerful."

"Be that as it may, you're still my most loyal and useful slave! Unlike some people..."

Jinta glared at Hisagi who flinched at the intensity of the stare. His knees were actually shaking. Jinta kept that pants wetting stare fixed on him for awhile before turning kind eyes back on Ichigo. Hisagi gasped and coughed, realizing that he had been holding his breath the entire time Jinta was staring at him. His will was being destroyed little by little. It was getting to be just too much work to oppose Jinta when he was forced to reside on his body. But he didn't want to turn into a simpering, demure, pet either.

Jinta looked Ichigo over and said, "Well I'm benevolent god carrot top so I'm going to give you a reward! Are you ready for it?"

Ichigo got down on his hands and knees and bowed to Jinta's massive face. "It's more than I deserve Lord Jinta. I will accept anything you give me as a gift greater than my own life."

"This is why I like you so much carrot top. You know just what to say!" Jinta laughed.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: God Punishes the False God

choices: Jinta heads for the next town.
Jinta finds a way to clean himself up.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta looked around and tried to think of a good reward for his little slave. What exactly do you give a tiny speck? Jinta scratched his chin, thinking it over and trying to come up with something. Ichigo saw that his god was having trouble, and just over something insignificant as himself.

“Lord Jinta, if you can’t think of anything, it’s fine. Just serving you is a reward in itself!”

“Don’t be silly, carrot top.” Jinta told his slave, grinning down at him. “You saved me back there, so you deserve something else other than serving my godly being.” Jinta paused for a moment as a light bulb went on in his head. “Godly being…me…hmmm, I wonder…”

Ichigo looked puzzled as Jinta started to approach the ruins of Karakura Town. Jinta knelt by the edge of the town and placed Ichigo on his shoulder next to Hisagi. Jinta placed both his hands against the ground and pressed down, crushing anything and everything underneath them. The boy began to concentrate as he began to manipulate reality again. He wasn’t tearing it, though, but changing it like he changed the space around Grimmjow into a sphere. Slowly, everything around his hands began to shift inward. Stone, metal, wood, glass, water…everything bonded together into a thick, molten liquid that flowed toward the space between Jinta’s hands. Ichigo and Hisagi watched in awe at this miracle…a miracle of God. The new material started to rise and take on a new shape. Karakura Town was being used to create something else…something better than it ever could have been. When Jinta was finally finished, half of the destroyed town was gone and replaced with barren wasteland. Its very existence was used to make…this.

Before Jinta stood a giant statue of himself, reaching up to the boy’s waist. Despite being made of many different materials, it took on a shiny, chrome-like appearance. The statue was striking a victory-pose; one of its fists pumped into the air. Underneath one of its feet was the defeated form of Grimmjow. Next to the Jinta statue was another statue, this one smaller and in the likeness of Ichigo. It stood up to the bigger statue’s ankle and was striking a similar pose. Jinta removed Ichigo from his shoulder and placed him in front of the statues.

Ichigo looked up in amazement at the sculptures. The one of him was marvelous and brought a smile to the boy’s face, but he knew the statue of Jinta was far superior in every way. He didn’t deserve to stand next to his God like that. As Ichigo looked over both figures, he noticed a small detail near his own statue. Underneath its foot was the human-sized model of Hisagi, who seemed to be struggling under the weight of the teen’s giant form. This made Ichigo want to burst out into laugher, but resisted as not to make his master think he was laughing at the statue itself.

“It’s amazing, Lord Jinta! Thank you! Nothing better deserves to be built here!” Ichigo shouted up, praising his master further.

“Glad you like it, carrot top. I’m a pretty good artist, if I do say so myself.” Jinta said, stroking his own ego. The red head picked Ichigo back up and placed him his pocket one again. “Anyway, I hope that’s the last distraction for awhile. It’s time to get back to business!”

Jinta scanned over the horizon and made out what looked like another town in the distance. It would be the next victim of his divine rampage. Looking up at the sky, Jinta noticed it was starting to show signs of night. If he went now, he may be able to cause a bit of chaos before resting for the night.

…then again, that battle with the Arrancar had left Jinta with a dirty feeling. His clothes, face, arms, feet…everything was stained with mud and the Arrancar’s blood. He was a god and gods were prefect. They weren’t supposed to look like homeless people who looked like they just came from a brawl. Though…how do gods bathe and wash their clothes?
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: An Improvement

choices: Jinta arrives in the town...
Once again, someone (or something) tries to oppose him...
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta looked around and his eyes fell on the ocean. At this point, it was the only nearby body of water that would be big enough for him to submerge himself in. He didn't have any soap or shampoo to clean himself with, but he could at least wash the blood and dirt off of his body. He lumbered over to the beach and grabbed Hisagi off his shoulder and fished Ichigo out of his pocket and brought them up to his face.

"Listen up slaves! I'm going to go wash myself off in the water. You can too if you want but when I'm done, you're done, so don't dawdle!"

He set them both down by the edge of the water and started stripping. His shirt, pants, and underwear all went flying onto the rubble of the city, leaving the boy god in all his naked glory. He stepped into the water, his slightest movements making huge waves that rolled into the shore. Before they could undress Ichigo and Hisagi found themselves floating out into the ruins of the city before undertow yanked them back towards Jinta's body. Jinta waded out until he was waist deep in the water and bent down, running water all over his body. He paid special attention to his feet which were absolutely filthy. He scrubbed between the toes and thought, "When I get more slaves, they're all going to do this for me."

As Jinta washed himself Ichigo and Hisagi were caught up in a maelstrom of water. Jinta's slightest movement caused the waters to churn and swirl, dragging the two Soul Reapers around, occasionally bumping into Jinta's massive form. The sweat, dirt, and blood from their own bodies was washed away but the experience was draining away their energy, and Hisagi didn't have much energy left as it was. Jinta suddenly ducked under the water, his descending body dragging both teens down, down, down into the depths of the water. Jinta ran his hands through his hair and made sure all the grime was gone. He rose up out of the water like some primordial monster and Hisagi and Ichigo were dragged up with him, breaking the surface with loud gasps and moans. Jinta, of course, heard all this and smirked down at his slaves. It was all part of his plan to break Hisagi. The stubborn sixty nine face had to be getting ready to submit.

Now done cleaning himself, Jinta scooped up his slaves and walked back to short. His little dip into the ocean had caused massive flooding in what was once Karakura Town, submerging his statue somewhat. He didn't like that. He put his hands into the water and, using his reality warping powers, drew all the water back into the ocean. He then drew all the salt and residues off his statue until it was gleaming like new again and Jinta was left holding a sphere of filth. He tore open a small hole in space and tossed it in before turning to his clothes. He grabbed them up and scrubbed them in the water, removing all sweat stains, blood, and dirt. Once that was done, put his soaking wet clothes on, after setting Ichigo and Hisagi down by his feet where his enormous body dripped all over them, and drew all the salt and water out of his clothes and off his body until he had a large ball of salt water. He tossed this into the ocean where it rejoined with the ocean. Now dry and clean, Jinta picked up his slaves and examined them.

"You guys are soaked too, huh? Here let me get that for you." He swiftly removed the water from Ichigo's clothes and body and tossed it into the ocean. He frowned down at Hisagi and said, "You can stay soaked."

He dropped Hisagi onto his shoulder again, and gently placed Ichigo in his pocket. He turned to the other town in the distance and said, "Time to move on!"
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Cleaning Up Before Taking Over

choices: Punish the disobedient slaves with some destruction.
Spare them and take a nap in the city till morning.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
The townsfolk were just wrapping up their day. Some were heading home after shopping, others leaving work to be with their families. The day had been filled with slight tremors and loud noises, but the arrogant mortals didn’t think much of it. When the ground started to shake again, the citizens looked around once more for an explanation. Then they saw it moments before it was too late. The humongous form of a red-haired child, miles high, stepped over a nearby mountainside and into their precious town. The boy’s large feet crushed any buildings under them into nothingness, killing hundreds in the process. Jinta grinned and folded his arms across his chest while he eyes gleamed down at the thousands of new victims. People were already trying to flee, running or driving away from his looming form. Chaos had already begun, and Jinta hadn’t even been here a full minute yet. When Jinta noticed the insects were trying to escape, he merely grinned wider and slammed his fist into the ground by his feet. Instead of creating an explosion and devastating the entire town, the force of the punch seemed to be absorbed into the ground and spread outward. The specks below felt the energy flow past them as it made its way to the outskirts of the city. Once in place, the earth around the city burst open and walls of stone surrounded the entire settlement. The city, and its inhabitants, were locked in with no means of escape.

“Sorry, bugs, but there won’t be an evacuation this time! Your lives are over; you serve Lord Jinta now, your new God!” Jinta declared. He watched as groups of people started to form below him. Streets all around him were filled with tiny little specks. They all strained their necks and looked up at the giant being, shocked that something so big could be alive. Jinta smirked as he listened to all of them murmur. Some were talking amongst themselves, others were breaking into tears. Some even prayed to some God Jinta knew wasn’t going to help them. The titan hovered his left bare foot over a street and held it so that an entire group of people were just inches below it. Many buildings were easily pushed aside to make room for it, some even collapsing on the gatherers. “For your first act of devotion: kiss my foot!”

The townsfolk did nothing; only stared up at Jinta’s looming sole. They were too frightened and too confused to do a thing. Jinta scowled as he boomed, “Not gonna do it, eh? Fine by me…I like feeling you specks squish under my foot!” Without giving his slaves the chance to process what he said, Jinta pressed his foot into the ground and ended a couple hundred more lives. He swung his foot over and held it over another street full of worshippers. “You know what to do!”

This time, the townsfolk complied and began kissing their new deity’s foot. Even if it was over a hundred people, most of Jinta’s sole remained un-kissed. It was just too large and the mortals were just too small and insignificant. As Jinta took in the attention he was getting, he felt more tiny bugs kissing his other foot. Some brave insects even started climbing Jinta’s foot and kissing it. The boy giant was amazed at how easily mere humans could be intimidated and broken. As he enjoyed his worship, his superhuman sight noticed some small flashes coming from some of the buildings around him. Kids had rushed to the rooftops and began snapping photos of the giant boy. Jinta just smiled down at them and posed for the pictures. He threw up some peace signs, gave a few thumbs up, and even flexed a bit. Anything to make him look like the world’s newest (and greatest) celebrity.

“Okay, that’s enough.” Jinta said after awhile. He removed his left foot from his slaves and shook the devoted ones off his right, accidentally flinging many to their dooms. He looked around him and noticed that the town’s entire population still hadn’t gathered before him. Many were still hiding in buildings or driving through the streets looking for an exit. The question was: what to do with such disloyal slaves?
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: New Town, New Slaves

choices: The next morning, Jinta wakes up and punishes those who strayed
Something happens in the night
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta was about to use his gravity powers to gather up all the disloyal slaves that were trying to escape him but suddenly let loose an amazing yawn. To the tiny people below it was as rumbling as distant thunder. Jinta smacked his lips tiredly and noticed that it was getting pretty dark. It had been a long day and Jinta was tired. He looked down at the specks milling around his feet and said, "I'm too tired to deal with you punks right now. Mark my words, though, tomorrow morning, bright and early, those of you who oppose me, are disloyal to me, or try to escape from me will be severely punished."

He emphasized his remarks by slamming his fist into his open palm. Everyone got the picture quite clearly.

Jinta yawned again and stretched his young muscles out, grabbing Hisagi and Ichigo in his hand. With his other hand he pulled his shirt off and folded it into a neat square, putting it on his chest as he lay down and putting Ichigo onto the shirt. Ichigo snuggled into the material and was almost instantly asleep. He was exhausted after the days events. Hisagi, however, wasn't so lucky. Jinta plucked him up and held him above his face.

"Listen you. You've been nothing more than a useless pain in my ass this whole day. I'm giving you one more chance. Tomorrow, if you don't do anything useful to help your god, I'll end your miserable life. Got it?"

Hisagi nodded, getting the point.

"Good. Now I can't trust you sleeping out in the open so I've got an idea."

He pressed his hand against the ground and pulled a tiny amount of a sticky substance from it. It seemed to be a mixture of sap, mud, and other natural adhesives. He stuck it to Hisagi's feet and dropped the tiny Soul Reaper into his belly button. Hisagi fell for what felt like forever before he landed, feet first, at the bottom. He tried to free himself desperately, but it was no good. He was trapped inside the boy titan's belly button. It was huge and expansive, like being trapped inside an enormous canyon. The sounds of the boy's stomach was amplified, the entire area filled with the gurgling and growling of the boy's belly. Jinta laughed as he felt Hisagi stick. Not too long ago only a single person had been able to fit in there, and that was doubled over. Now he could fit hundreds, maybe more, inside. He was just getting greater and greater, his ego swelling with every passing minute. It was hard to believe he had ever counted himself among the specks at his feet. He put his arms behind his head and sighed in pleasure, falling asleep rather quickly.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Too Tired To Destroy

choices: In the morning, Hollow Ichigo has taken over Ichigo's body.
Jinta somehow barges into Ichigo's inner world.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Even if Jinta was an almighty god, he slept like a baby. As Jinta and Ichigo (as well as Hisagi, if the sounds of the stomach didn’t keep him up) slept, none of them were aware that they were being watched. On top of a nearby cliffside overlooking the town, a middle aged man wearing a bucket hat watched the giant boy sleep. He witnessed the boy snore lightly as a thick tendril of drool dripped into the town, partially flooding the streets.

“He always had such annoying sleeping habits.” the man said before frowning and covering his eyes with his hat, as if mourning. “It’s a shame it came to this, but I suppose it’s my fault for leaving that experimental slime in the shop.”

“Don’t show any sympathy for that monster. Do you know how much he’s done within the course of a day?” spoke another man from behind Kisuke. He stood with a third figure, who was reasonably shorter than him.

“I’m aware of that, but there’s nothing to worry about.” Kisuke replied as he turned to face his two accomplices. “That mixture was meant to turn even the most average of people into a fully functional god. It was meant to be a back up plan if anything terribly wrong happened to the world. For that reason, Jinta possesses not only the ability to destroy…but someday may even possess the power to create.”

“You expect him to just redo everything he did and apologize afterward? Get real!” raised the voice of the shorter figure.

“Of course not.” Urahara said with a chuckle before taking out two vials from his coat containing the mysterious slime. Unlike the slime in his shop or the sample Aporro created, these vials glowed with an eerie light. He jiggled them between is fingers as he smirked. “I expect you two to set everything right.”

The two figures stepped out of the shadows that were concealing their identity up till now. They were none other than the presumed deceased Soul Reapers, Toshiro Hitsugaya and Renji Abarai.

“Look, Urahara, we’re thankful that you saved us and we haven’t contacted Soul Society like you asked, but you can’t seriously being thinking of turning us into gods. No one should have that power.” objected Renji with a look of concern on his face.

“And yet that brat behind me does.” Kisuke pointed a thumb at the sleeping Jinta. “I’m sorry to ask this, but it’s up to you to clean up his mess.”

The two Soul Reapers looked at each other and nodded. There wasn’t much of a choice. Hitsugaya spoke for the both of them as he said, “Very well, but you can reverse the effects, right?”

“Of course, though I don’t see why you’d want to…” Kisuke muttered the last part before tossing the two vials at the younger men. The two caught them and gulped the contents down instantly. Both their faces turned green as they covered their mouths in disgust.

“Ugh…when does this stuff start to kick in, anyway?” Renji asked as he started coughing.

“It’s a more advanced form of the original Jinta used, but it’ll take longer to work through your system. It could be tomorrow or a few days from now. When it does kick in, you’ll possess all the powers Jinta has and then some. You’ll also be able to control your size at will.”

“So we just wait while that brat plays with people like toys and gets stronger? What if he gets so big that he ruins the Earth with a single step? We‘ll be dead before we can act!” Renji clenched his fist in anger.

“That’s why we’ll be waiting in Soul Society, away form Jinta and his destruction.” Kisuke answered as he waved his hand and summoned a gate behind the Soul Reapers. “Besides, Jinta’s accession into godhood won’t be without its roadblocks. I’m sure there will be many who’ll try and obstruct his path. One may even be rearing its ugly head soon…” Kisuke finished speaking and followed the two high-ranking Soul Reapers into the gate, leaving Jinta and his slaves behind.

Meanwhile, with Jinta and co., Ichigo was not having a comfortable sleep. The teen tossed and turned within Jinta’s shirt, sweating heavily and squeezing his eye shut as if having a nightmare. When his eyes shot opened, he was met with a clear blue sky. Refusing to believe it was daytime alright, Ichigo stood up and realized he was standing in his inner world. As he stood on the tilted skyscraper, he suddenly felt a leg smack into his stomach and send him flying backwards. Ichigo stopped himself from rolling off the skyscraper and glared at his white doppelganger. His inner Hollow pointed a white finger at the teen.

“You’ve become weak, Kurosaki!” shouted the Hollow with a corrupted version of his own voice. “Ever since submitting to that brat, you’ve become weak as shit!”

“It’s this or dying!” Ichigo shouted back. “Living as Lord Jinta’s servant is the only thing for me now. I couldn’t wish for anything better.”

Ichigo’s Hollow frowned as he muttered, “Pitiful.” and turned the frown into a mad smile. “I refuse to work under such a pitiful ’king’!”

“What are you going to do, then? Fight him? You’ll be squashed like a grape!”

“Probably, but so will you because we INHABIT THE SAME BODY, DUMBASS!!” Hollow Ichigo screamed at Ichigo. The orange-haired boy widened his eyes a bit. He had a point there. He watched as his white clone placed his arm by his side and pull Zangetsu out of thin air. Even his sword seemed to be sick with him. “I’m going to take over your body and then hightail it out of here! Jinta can try and stop me, but he’ll have to kill both of us to do so!” Ichigo was starting to show signs of fear as Hollow Ichigo pointed his blade at him. “Just hold still, taking over your body when you’re this weak with be a piece of cake.”

Ichigo looked on fearfully as his inner Hollow rushed at him, laughing like a madman with sword in hand.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Two Forces Working in the Shadows

choices: Morning comes and Jinta begins his conquest
Hisagi gets free of the gum and tries to escape
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Ichigo closed his eyes and waited for the impact. Normally he would jump up and fight back, taking everything from his Inner Hollow and banishing his presence to the back of his mind. But now, after giving so much to Jinta, he had nothing left for himself. He lived for Jinta and now was going to die because he couldn't have the will to defend himself. The last thought that crossed his mind as his Inner Hollow got closer was, "Please protect me Lord Jinta."

A violent explosion appeared in between Ichigo and his rampaging Inner Hollow, forcing the latter back.

"Huh? What the hell is this?" the manic creature questioned.

A huge...something was now separating the two boys, a something that looked somehow familiar...

Suddenly, the huge object moved, rising into the air, splitting the building in half. Ichigo gaped up as he watched the creature that had been minutes away from killing him and taking over his body getting carried away into the sky. His eye strayed slightly downward and he saw a great white expanse that definitely wasn't a cloud...and below that a massive area of blue with no clouds in it, so it couldn't be sky...and further up there was...

"Hey carrot top! I heard you calling and came to help ya!"

"Lord Jinta! H-how--?"

"I wouldn't be a very good god if I couldn't protect my faithful worshipers and slaves! Now sit back and let me take care of this clown!"

Ichigo did as he was told and sat down obediently, smiling up at his god. Jinta brought the tiny white speck up to his eyes and said, "So, you've been messing around with slave's head huh? We can't have that!"

"Heh! You fool! I don't care how big you are! I'm not going to lay down and submit to you! Now DIE!!"

Jinta watched in amusement as the creature charged at him, swinging his sword above his head. Jinta calmly blew a small wave of air at him which pushed the Inner Hollow down, swiftly, towards the ground. Before he reached it Jinta raised his foot and kicked him like a tiny hacky sack which sent him flying up to Jinta's chest. Jinta waited until he was at the peak of the rise and then smashed him with his fist. He did this back and forth for awhile until he got bored. He picked the Inner Hollow out of the hole had had made in the concrete and held him up to his face.

"Alright you little germ, listen up! You're not going to do anything to harm my little slave ever again!"

The creature laughed feebly and said, "You can't do anything to me...I'll still be here...even when you're gone!"

Jinta smirked and said, "Yeah, that would be true if you were dealing with a mortal. But watch THIS!"

Jinta warped reality until a sphere surrounded the Inner Hollow until he was totally trapped. The then dropped the sphere and warped reality around it in a bigger sphere. He did this again, and again, and again, until, in place of one of the skyscrapers, there was an enormous ball of bent reality. Jinta dusted his hands and looked down at Ichigo.

"There you go carrot top! He won't be bothering you anymore!"

Ichigo got on his hands and knees again and said, "Thank you Lord Jinta! I can't express how thankful I am!"

Jinta put his arms behind his head and said, "Heh, it was no trouble for a guy like me!"

"Lord Jinta...if I may ask a question..." Ichigo said quietly.

"Sure! What's on your mind carrot top?" Jinta asked, crossing his arms.

"How did you get in here? This is a world that exists in my mind..."

"Yeah, well, we're both asleep right? I just heard you say you wanted me to protect you so I broke through reality and found myself in this dinky little city. Finding you was a piece of cake."

Ichigo was incredibly impressed. His master had heard him, not speaking, but thinking in another dimension and had come to save him. His devotion to the boy continued rising. Jinta scooped up Ichigo in his hand and said, "Come on, let's get out of here. I need to get my rest for tomorrows conquest!"

Ichigo nodded eagerly and gazed up at Jinta, devotion evident on his face. Jinta reached out with his other hand and opened a huge hole in reality. After stepping through it, Ichigo felt his mind snap off like someone turned out a light. He would remember this event when he woke in the morning, but for now, he was at peace. Jinta wasn't quite the same. He was still asleep, but was aware. At any moment he could spring into action though, to the outside eye, he appeared to be deeply asleep. His omniscience as a god was slowly growing along with his body. Soon, he would be indisputable...
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: No Place is Safe From Jinta

choices: Hisagi agrees and suggests something.
Hisagi refuses and Ichigo comes up with something.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta and his two main slaves slept peacefully during the night. Even Hisagi was eventually lulled to sleep by the gurgling of Jinta’s stomach. The rest of the slaves, however, had a restless night. They were constantly kept awake by their god’s snoring. The waterfall of droll that lasted most of the night flooded several of the streets, forcing many to find new spots to rest. When they finally did manage to fall asleep, it was already morning and Jinta was ready to get up. The young god blinked his eyes open and rubbed the sleep out of his eyes while yawning loudly. The yawn acted like an oversized alarm clock that signaled everyone, including Ichigo and Hisagi, to wake up. As Jinta smacked his lips together, he glanced down at Ichigo on his chest. The orange head smiled up at his master, a look Jinta knew was another way of showing how thankful he was to his god for saving him last night.

“Sleep well, carrot top?” Jinta asked as he leaned up a bit and scratched his stomach.

Ichigo nodded in response and said, “Your shirt is so comfy, it was like being in heaven.” Ichigo hugged the white fabric to emphasize his point. He knew he couldn’t cling to it forever, though, and allowed Jinta to pluck him off it so the giant could stand up and stretch. He deposited Ichigo back into his pants pocket and was about to pull his shirt over his head when another voice echoed from his navel.

“What about me? Aren’t you going to take me out?!” Hisagi asked desperately.

“Not when you ask like that.” was Jinta’s reply as he covered himself with his white shirt and enveloped Hisagi in darkness. Jinta looked down at his other slaves, who were just starting to wake up. “Listen up, bugs! I’m going to go punish the disobedient slaves form last night. I expect all of you to be up and ready by the time I’m done. Anyone still sleeping will find themselves waking up in the afterlife!”

With his order given, Jinta left his slaves and started to march through town. His eyes traveled down to the streets where many cars were still moving. They must have been up all night trying to find an escape route. What a waste of their last moments…

“Trying to find a way out? I’ll show you one!” Jinta bellowed a she reached down and scooped up a bunch of vehicles and people-occupied buildings. He brought them to his face and licked his lips hungrily. “Breakfast time!” The hundreds of scared individuals looked on helplessly as Jinta opened his maw wide and threw the handful into it. When everything was resting on his pink tongue, Jinta slammed his jaws shut and started munching and chewing discriminately. Jinta reared his head back and swallowed, sending everything down to his empty gut. The boy grinned and rubbed his stomach. “That’s another duty of you slaves: feeding me!” Jinta went on to grab several more handfuls and repeat the process until he was satisfied…for now. The spiky red head felt a burp coming up from his stomach, but instead of releasing it into the air, he knelt down and unleashed it on the city below. The sound waves emitted from his gaping mouth tore the defenseless town apart. When he was finished, his vocals had reduced a large section of the town to a barren wilderness.

“Mmmmm…that was good.” Jinta complimented himself before turning his attention to his pocketed slave. “You hungry, carrot top?”

Ichigo nodded and Jinta scanned the ground for somewhere that served breakfast. He spotted a café and placed his hand over it. Using his powers, the café was completely broken down and left behind only its food items. Jinta took a bit of it and dropped it into his pocket, where Ichigo began to chow down happily.

“Um…Jinta?” Hisagi mumbled.

“Hmm?”

“I mean…Lord Jinta.”

“What is it, sixty nine man?”

“Can I…please have some food?”

“Well, since you asked so nicely…” Jinta looked over his palm for any leftover pieces and spotted half a bagel. He pinched the tiny object between his fingers, lifted his shirt up, and flicked the bagel into his bellybutton. It smacked right into Hisagi’s face, who groaned in detest before taking the “gift” and eating it.

With his two servants fed, Jinta looked around for more bad slaves to punish. He spotted several cars trying to cross a bridge to the other side of town. Jinta stopped over there until the tiny passage was between his legs. Using a single finger, Jinta pressed down on the middle of the bridge and split it in two. Many cars kept on driving, either flying off the bridge or smashing into the titan’s skin. As Jinta watched this happen, his ears picked up the sound of a ship in the distance. Looking left, he noticed the town was also connected to the ocean, and his stone wall hadn’t blocked it off. Three ships were trying to sail to freedom, and Jinta didn’t like that very much. He ripped a hole in reality and pressed his face up to it. Another hole opened directly below the three ships, underwater. The rest was simple. Jinta began to drink the water, sucking up the ships in a whirlpool and sending them down his gullet. He didn’t seem to mind the taste of salt water at all. When he was done, he closed up the holes and wiped some water off his lips.

“Aaaahh…well, I think that’s enough for now.” Jinta strolled back over to where his slaves were waiting. He faced the destruction he caused and shouted loudly, “Any survivors who’ve learned their lesson, get over here NOW!” As if having been waiting for that very command, many people rushed out of their hiding spots and joined the other townsfolk around Jinta. Many cars in the distance changed their direction and drove toward the giant god. When his amount of worshipers had almost doubled, Jinta spoke down to them again. “It’s time for you specks to show your devotion again! Now…what can I have you do?”

Jinta crossed his arms and started to think. However, he must still be tired, because no matter how hard he tried he couldn’t think of a damn thing other than foot worship, which he had already been given last night. He was about to ask carrot top for a suggestion when another idea popped into his head.

“Hey, sixty nine man!” Jinta shouted at his stomach. This caused many of his slaves to look at him with puzzled expressions. Why exactly was he talking to his stomach?

“What?” Hisagi asked disrespectfully. Jinta was still annoyed by Hisagi’s level of resistance, but ignored it.

“Here’s your chance at lasting another day: I can’t think of anything these slaves can do, so think of something for me!”

Hisagi didn’t know what to say. He was being asked to pick a torture for thousands of people. How was he supposed to think up something like that?

“It’s fine if you can’t think of anything, I’ll just ask carrot top. However, keep in mind that your god doesn’t ask for help that often. This might be your only chance at helping me before the day ends. What’s it going to be?”

It was a simple enough deal: his life for the suffering of thousands. Hisagi didn’t want to die by this kid’s hand, but he had taken an oath to protect the humans of the living world. Perhaps another chance at helping Jinta would come up…or maybe not. Even if one did, who’s to say it won’t be even WORSE.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: The Start of the Second Day

choices: As Jinta conquers the next few cities he starts growing again
Jinta gets side tracked from his conquering to force Hisagi into submission
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Hisagi weighed his options and knew he had no choice. It was life or death and he would be able to do more good alive than dead. He closed his eyes and was about to whisper an apology to the people he was about to betray when he realized that Jinta would hear him. He didn't want to give that monster the satisfaction of knowing how much this was affecting him so he simply said, "Alright, I'll come up with something."

Jinta smirked and said, "Good boy. Don't be too long though. I'm not feeling very patient this morning. You've got thirty seconds."

Hisagi's mind raced as he tried to come up with an idea. Jinta had already had his foot worshiped last night so he wasn't interested in that. He had already eaten so he wasn't hungry so he couldn't suggest that. Maybe there was a way they could bring pleasure to Jinta...but how? Hisagi was loathe to suggest anything sexual. He didn't want to subject hundreds of people to trying to please the monster that was hidden in Jinta's pants. Boy or not, when you're Jinta's size you had genitals that commanded respect.

"Tick tock sixty nine face!" Jinta said dangerously. "Ten seconds!"

Hisagi suddenly blurted out, "Why not have them massage your body Lord Jinta? You must be sore after so much activity yesterday!"

Jinta thought about it for a moment. He experimentally rolled his shoulders and bent over testing his back. He lifted his legs and rolled his feet before standing still again with his hands on his hips. "Now that you mention it bug boy I am feeling a little stiff. That's a pretty good idea. Not as good as carrot top's have been but you're getting there."

Jinta whipped off his shirt again and pointed at his new slaves. "Alright you little specks! Listen up! You're going to be massaging your god's body until I'm satisfied! We'll start you off small with my lower back."

Before he laid himself out on the ground he pulled Ichigo out of his pocket and forcibly removed Hisagi from his navel with his powers. With both specks in his hands he said, "Don't think you two are exempt from this. You're still my slaves!"

Ichigo got down on his hands and knees and replied, "Of course Lord Jinta! I wouldn't have it any other way! My time is most valuable when it's used serving you!"

Jinta nodded and glared at Hisagi who just said, "Yeah, I figured you'd force us."

Jinta focused on Ichigo again and said, "Hey carrot top! Keep an eye on sixty nine man and make sure he's constantly working! If he's not, alert me and I'll punish him good!"

Ichigo got to his feet and saluted. "Of course Lord Jinta! As you command!"

Satisfied, Jinta got down on his stomach and dropped Ichigo and Hisagi on his lower back. Instantly Ichigo got down and started rubbing, his hands kneading into Jinta's skin as best he could. Hisagi followed suit, much more reluctantly. Jinta held his hand out over his new worshipers and the frightened crowd began screaming in terror as they felt their bodies being dragged upward by Jinta's power. Soon, he had all of his slaves in the palm of his hand. He unceremoniously dumped the slaves onto his lower back, using his powers to make sure none of them died on the way down. With that done, he sighed and buried his head in his arms, closing his eyes. All of the people on his lower back started rubbing, spreading out over the huge expanse of the boy's flesh. Jinta could feel them all scurrying like fleas, doing whatever they could to please him, their tiny hands working his back over. It actually was quite soothing. Hisagi attempted to slack off and slip away undetected but Ichigo kept close to him like a guard dog. Whenever it looked like Hisagi was about to sprint Ichigo would grab him by the arm and force him back down. Once, Ichigo had to tackle the other Soul Reaper to keep him working.

Soon enough Jinta felt his back loosen up and he levitated his slaves back into his palm. He sat up and said, "So far, so good. Now for my arms."

He separated the people into two groups, making sure to keep Ichigo and Hisagi in the same group, and deposited half of them on the inside of each elbow, at the base of his biceps.He stared up into the blue sky as he felt the tiny people spread out over his bicep and forearms, massaging the massive muscles there. Well, massive in size, not definition. By this time the slaves were already starting to feel pretty tired. Massaging a god was tough work and Jinta was being relentless. After they were done massaging his arms he moved them to his shoulders. After that, he moved them to his calves and then his ankles, before ending with his feet. Once all was said and done the slaves were exhausted, their limbs shaking from all the work they had to do. Ichigo and Hisagi were better off, but not by much. Ichigo was the only one who was in a good mood. Jinta gathered all his slaves into his palm again and said, "Not bad specks, not bad at all. You surprised me with your work today. Especially you carrot top. Way to keep sixty nine face in line!"

Ichigo blushed at the compliment and just nodded. Hisagi rolled his eyes.

Jinta fished Ichigo out from the crowd and put him back into his pocket. He also grabbed Hisagi and dropped him on his shoulder. "Since you came up with the idea I won't shove you back inside my belly button but you're still on probation as far as I'm concerned...but I won't kill you at the end of today either way. Tomorrow though, I can't make the same promise."

Hisagi sighed a little in relief. It wasn't much, but he was alive for another day. Jinta turned his eye on the rest of the population of slaves in his palm and said, "As for the rest of you...you're all expendable. That's the way it goes with God Jinta. Deal with it."

The townspeople were too tired to do much except weep and moan at their awful fortune. Jinta scratched his chin as he decided whether or not he should use his slaves again for something else, or just dispose of them and move on. There was an entire world of people out there. Then again, if he kept killing his slaves there would be no one left to worship him except Ichigo and Hisagi. He deposited them safely back into their town and said, "I've decided to spare your lives since you were all faithful worshipers. This doesn't mean I'm going to go out of my way to protect you though. Soon enough I'll be too big to worry about what a bunch of germs are doing milling around my feet. But until then you have the privilege of seeing your god dominate the world!"

With that, Jinta scanned the horizon for his next conquest.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Saved By Decision

choices: Jinta asks Hisagi what's going on in Soul Society.
The army isn't intimidated by Jinta's size and attacks again.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
As Jinta left the ruined town, the townsfolk just watched him leave with hopeless expressions. What were they supposed to do now? That wall was still up, so they couldn’t flee unless someone came to rescue them or they took another ship out to sea. None of it mattered, though, because this town knew more than any other that nowhere was safe from God Jinta.

As Jinta stepped over his makeshift wall, he checked around for his next destination. To his surprise, he spotted evidence of three more cities in three different directions.

“Heh, at this rate, Japan will surrender to me in no time. I wonder if they know how to contact a god…” Jinta laughed as chose one of the cities and headed for it. A few steps later, Jinta suddenly stopped in the middle of a clearing. So far, the day had been great, but something was still nagging him in the back of his mind. That thing was a bug and its name was sixty nine man. Jinta glared over at his shoulder at Hisagi, who had been looking into the distance. When the Soul Reaper noticed they had stopped moving, he looked up at Jinta to meet that menacing glare. The teenaged-looking man started to sweat a bit as he backed away from the humongous face.

“W-what? Why are you l-looking at m-me? Did I do something wrong?” Hisagi asked, as polite as possible without seeming like a pitiful slave. That was exactly what ticked Jinta off.

“You’re slowly starting to come around, but it’s not fast enough for my tastes. I still don’t like the way you talk or that look in your eye. Those cites aren’t going anywhere, but you’re just waiting for the chance to run back to your Soul Society buddies, aren’t you? I think it’s about time you turned into a sniveling slave, sixty nine man.”

Jinta moved his hand to his shoulder and pinched Hisagi off it. The young god dropped the vice captain in his palm and held him up to his grinning face. Hisagi just continued to cower before the boyish face, backing away from it as fast as possible.

“What are you going to do to me? Torture me?” Hisagi asked, almost choking because he was so frightened. Jinta liked that the man was frightened, but it wasn’t enough. Hisagi should be bowing down to him, not backing away.

“No, torturing slaves is fun, but I have a faster method in mind. I’m just gonna beat you into submission!”

Hisagi was about to ask what that meant, but wasn’t able to before Jinta’s other hand appeared and flicked him into the horizon. Hisagi was spiraling uncontrollably toward the city they had just visited. Before he got anywhere near it, though, Jinta put his arm through another space-time hole and caught the flying bug. Taking his hand out, Jinta brought his open palm up to his face just like before. This time, instead of cowering, Hisagi was laying on his stomach in incredible pain. Jinta took the same finger he flicked Shuhei with and started to press it down on the speck-sized Soul Reaper. To Hisagi, it felt like a skyscraper…no…ten skyscrapers were crushing him with their weight.

“Wanna see if I can squash you and then bring you back to life? I am a god, after all. Although, I can’t do ANYTHING yet. If I could, I’d of made myself bigger already!”

Jinta didn’t hear Hisagi respond, probably because he was in so much pain. Jinta removed his finger and tilted his hand. The weakened Hisagi suddenly felt his world turn upside down as he rolled off the god’s palm and started to fall several miles down to the ground. Jinta never let him get that far, though, as he quickly brought his knee up and bashed Hisagi back up. The head of the Ninth Division felt as if gravity had reversed and he watched the boy’s chest and face fly past him. When he finally fell back down, it wasn’t Jinta hand that caught him. The boy god opened his mouth and allowed Hisagi to freefall right into it like a popcorn kernel. Jinta snapped his mouth closed and started violently smashing Hisagi into his cheeks with his giant, pink muscle. Hisagi felt himself becoming drenched in Jinta’s salvia. If this continued, it would start to digest him. Before that happened, Jinta spat the once proud Soul Reaper into his palm and clapped his hands together. He rubbed his hands together as if cleaning them, smothering Hisagi in wet flesh. When he was done, he took his hand away to find sixty nine man plastered to his left hand. Jinta looked at him cruelly and brought him closer to his mouth.

“You ready to surrender? Or are we going to continue?” Jinta asked. The only thing that went thought Hisagi’s mind was the thought of being killed by this boy…no, this god. This god was really going to kill him at this rate.

“I…I give…” Hisagi barely managed to blurt out.

“What’s that? You give? As in, ’I’ll give you more trouble’?” Hisagi’s eyes widened and he shook his head. Jinta, however, just ignored him. He was having too much fun to stop now. “Guess you still need to be knocked around a bit.”

Jinta once again flicked the sticky Soul Reaper off his hand and into the distance. He caught him the same way as before, but this time put another hand through a second hole which caused it to reappear several miles away from the one that held Hisagi. Jinta tossed the vice captain at his other hand, which caught him and threw him back. Jinta played catch with Hisagi for awhile before taking his hands from the rips in reality. He held Hisagi out in front of him and looked him over. He was in bad shape, with both his arms bent at odd angles and blood practically flowing from his mouth.

“Got anything to say before he continue, bug boy?”

Hisagi didn’t have the energy to even cry. He was scared of dying and only wanted to live, so in his desperation he decided to abandon everything else.

“I…I’m sorry. I’ll be good. I’ll be a good slave. Just please have mercy on me, Lord Jinta. I beg you.”

Jinta smiled and replied, “Good, then we’re done.”, before putting his other hand over Hisagi. Using his powers, he healed the slave of all his injuries and returned him to perfect health. When Hisagi felt his energy return, he immediately got off his back and onto his hands and knees.

“Who’s your god and master?” Jinta asked.

“You are, Lord Jinta.” Hisagi replied, kissing Jinta’s skin.

“Who could squash you like the bug you are?”

“You could, Lord Jinta.”

“What will you do if you’re ever given the chance to run away?”

“I’ll stay with you for as long as my meaningless life allows, Lord Jinta!”

Jinta smirked a smirk that would put Aizen to shame. The old Hisagi was officially dead; all that remained was a shell of the Soul Reaper. A shell that would serve him without question.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Beaten into Submission

choices: Jinta orders his slaves to please him in some fashion
Jinta is interupted by the army, making its second attack
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta headed toward the next city, Hisagi now a pathetic whimpering bug on his shoulder, and was feeling pretty darn good about himself. Suddenly, he realized what a treasure he had in Hisagi. He faced the little guy and said, "So, what's going on in the Soul Society right now?"

Hisagi instantly got to his feet and said, "Mayuri Kurotsuchi, head of the Research and Development Department at the Soul Society, is currently working on an antidote to undo the effects of your godly stature Lord Jinta."

Jinta frowned at that and said, "Really...how far along was he the last time you were there?"

"A day ago he said he would need a day or two to complete the antidote. Therefore, he could very well have it complete by now! But that was back when you were a lesser god than you are now. Surely nothing he has can stop you!"

Jinta smiled at Hisagi and said, "No doubt! What else?"

"Captain General Yamamoto also expressed the desire to fire the Kido Cannon in an attempt to stop you. Again, this was a plan when you were in a less form. I doubt it could hurt you now!"

Jinta nodded slowly. So far so good. Nothing too threatening appeared to be on the horizon. "Anything else?"

Hisagi racked his brain for any and all information relating to the Soul Society. "That's...that's all I can think of Lord Jinta. If anything else is going on in the Soul Society it is outside my knowledge."

Jinta nodded again and said, "Good work slave. You did good."

Hisagi nodded happily, glad that he could finally be of use to his god and master. Jinta pandered for a moment on his situation. He was god like and getting even stronger every second that passed. Currently, both the Soul Society and Hueco Mundo were interested in him and had sent agents to take care of him. Through his own great power and ingenuity he had managed to repel all these opposing forces. Someone in the Soul Society was trying to create an antidote so it wasn't impossible to think that someone in Hueco Mundo was doing the same. Luckily, neither of these antidotes appeared to be done and, with all likelihood, Jinta would soon become powerful enough that the antidotes wouldn't matter a whit. He cracked his knuckles and decided not to worry about it. Surely nothing would come even close to opposing him.

He approached the city and got much the same reaction as before. The people screamed and panicked and attempted to escape which Jinta prevented by creating a wall around them. He smirked down at the puny specks and said, "Alright listen up! You're city number three on God Jinta's conquest list! I want all you people to come to the center of the city immediately and start worshiping me! Any who don't will be punished indiscriminately!"

Of course, around a quarter of the people hurried to the center of the city, by vehicle or foot, while the other three quarters still tried to escape. Jinta punished a quarter of those people by opening a rip in reality directly below them, sending them to a second hole that appeared above his waiting mouth. He swallowed them whole, adding them to the still digesting folk from the other town. He looked back down into the city and said, "If you don't want the same, then get to the center of the city!"

The remaining population gathered as he commanded. Once again Jinta had a small army of insects to do with whatever he pleased.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Hisagi's Report and Jinta's Dominance

choices: The army has one last trick up their sleeve...
Jinta has his slaves please him.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta was just about to put his new batch of slaves to work went he felt a variety of sounds gather behind him. He turned around just in time to see the army gathering before him again, this time with a much bigger force. Several groups of tanks and jeeps plowed through the forest toward the wall Jinta had made. Many helicopters flew over the wall and surrounded Jinta, who only looked at them in amusement.

“Long time no see, military bugs. Where have you been?” Jinta asked. His only reply was an “open fire” from one of the soldiers and the entire force began firing upon him. The tanks fired their bombshells over the wall and they exploded upon impact with Jinta’s torso. Because of Jinta’s growth, the only thing the giant god felt was a slight pressure created from the attacks. It was as if feathers were being thrown at him. “You guys didn’t stand a chance last time, so what makes you think you can harm me now? You’ve got guts, I’ll give you that.”

Jinta allowed the army to waste their ammo for the next couple minutes. Every explosion upon his titanic form was just absorbed by his size. His shirt wasn’t even getting burned. Growing tired, Jinta took a step forward and stomped on a group of tanks. Around ten of them were crushed instantly, while another ten were destroyed simply by the fissures that came afterwards. The townsfolk watched in horror as the brave soldiers that fought for their country were trampled on like bugs.

The young giant noticed a few jets coming toward the battlefield in the distance. They were probably planning on passing him and attacking him from behind, but they were foolish. Before they got the chance, Jinta sidestepped and watched the jets crash into his chest and explode on impact. The kid brushed the debris off his top and took another step forward. As his bare foot hovered over another group of tanks, they attempted to fire up at the sole to repel it. The attack just tickled Jinta and made him snicker before he made pancakes out of the armored vehicles.

While Jinta was dealing with the jets and the second group of tanks, a good number of soldiers started to climb the giant’s foot. Jinta noticed them reach the top and start shooting and stabbing the skin. They would have had better luck breaking through steel. Jinta smirked down at the brave bugs before using the bottom of his other foot to wipe their tiny bodies off. He looked back up to see several helicopters flying at him and shooting his face with machine guns. As they did this, a number of soldiers jumped out of the helicopters and hooked onto the front of Jinta’s shirt. They were probably planning on climbing the boy without him knowing, but unfortunately they didn’t know of his super senses. After Jinta blew the helicopters away, he looked down at his shirt as smiled at the frightened men.

“What’s that supposed to accomplish? “ Jinta asked them before taking his thumb and squashing each of the climbing bugs one by one. Each one left behind a small red dot which Jinta cleaned up by first licking the blood off his thumb and then wiping his shirt with it. As he was busy doing this, some more helicopters circled around him and dropped off some more forces on his back. Jinta growled in annoyance and tried to reach behind him to grab the insects, but they were in such a place that Jinta couldn’t reach them.

“Damn ticks, get off!” Jinta yelled at them. To his surprise, he started to hear small explosions coming from his back and the screams of the soldiers as they fell to their deaths. The god looked at his shoulder where Hisagi was firing Shakkaho at the climbing forces. When they were all taken care of, Hisagi noticed Jinta’s stare and immediately bowed to him.

“I’m sorry, master! I just wanted to help. If I acted out of line, please punish me!” Hisagi said with his face buried in Jinta’s clothing.

“Nah, it’s fine. You did good. Keep up the food work.” Jinta replied before turning his attention to the large amount of helicopters around him. At this rate they’d continue to drop soldiers on him until it became an annoyance. Jinta decided to take care of all of them at once. He stretched his arms out and used his powers to gather all the flying contraptions together; squashing them into a ball. Most of the pilots were already crushed, but some were still alive and struggling to get out of their twisted vehicles. Jinta let the ball plummet downward until he kicked it back up with his foot. He juggled the ball of metal for a bit before giving a swift kick and sending it hundreds of miles away. Not even he knew where it would land. Jinta looked back at the remaining forces and saw that they were starting to retreat.

“Run, little specks! Tell your superiors how much you got owned by God Jinta!”
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: The Army's Second Failure

choices: The residual radiation inside Jinta combines with the slime. He grows again!
Hisagi and Ichigo come up with an idea to cheer Jinta up.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
As the armed forces scurried away Jinta thought it was because they were retreating, escaping from the giant god. In reality, they were merely moving to a different location. The ones in charge of deploying the armed forces had never really believed that their men alone could take care of this threat no matter how many tanks or helicopters, jets or bombs they had. So they had prepared a contingency plan. Once they were far enough away from the massive boy, who was turning his attention on the trapped inhabitants of the city once more, they began prepping their secret weapon: a nuclear warhead.

They had wanted to avoid using this at all costs. The power unleashed would devastate the entire surrounding area, killing most of the trapped people in the city and irradiating the few who survived the blast. But it was a necessary evil. If they didn't do this, then the boy would only cause more horrific destruction around the country and, possibly, across the entire world. The countdown began, the boy's coordinates locked into the computer. Within ten seconds, this so called god would be no more.

Jinta had no idea about what was going to happen in less than thirty seconds. He was too busy picking around the crowded thousands of his new group of slaves. He wanted to do something special with them. He had already had his feet licked and his body massaged so what else could he do to these little specks? There were so many possibilities. Then again, he could always ask one of his two favorite slaves what to do. Better yet, maybe they could collaborate on something. Jinta decided to save that idea for another time. He raised his hand and was about to call all his new slaves into his palm when a strange whistling sound filled the air. Jinta straightened up and looked into the distance. With his super senses he could easily spot the nuke headed his way. He grinned and laughed at this futile attempt.

"Not even a nuclear blast is enough to stop me you idiots!" He yelled, not caring if the army could hear him or not. He puffed out his chest and said, "Go ahead! Take your best shot!"

Both Hisagi and Ichigo began shouting at once at Jinta who grabbed them both out of annoyance and brought them to his face. "What?!? What's wrong with you two? You're annoying me!"

Ichigo spoke first. "Please Lord Jinta! You can't let that bomb detonate on you!"

Jinta narrowed his eyes at Ichigo and said in a dangerous voice, "And why is that carrot top? Are you actually trying to order me around?"

Ichigo fell to his knees again, shaking with fear, and said, "That wasn't my intention Lord Jinta! Please forgive me!"

Hisagi took up where Ichigo left off and said, "What he means, Lord Jinta, is that if the bomb goes off on your body the blast won't harm you in the slightest, but the blast or the resulting radiation could severely hurt me and Ichigo!"

Hisagi then fell to his knees as well and both shouted, "PLEASE SPARE US LORD JINTA!"

Jinta nodded slowly, realizing that they were right. He didn't want to waste his most loyal slaves. They were his to do with what he wanted for as long as he wanted, which just so happened to be forever. But he still needed to get rid of that bomb. He could just open reality and have it disappear from this world altogether...but that wouldn't be too much fun. As he watched the bomb approach he suddenly got a great idea! He positioned his body so that the bomb was heading towards his face.

Back at the army base, the soldiers watched via computer as the bomb swiftly approached its target. The boy wasn't even trying to move, even though they could tell that he knew it was coming. They prayed that this would be the end of it...

Jinta opened his mouth wide as the bomb fell toward him, catching it neatly on his tongue and swallowing it whole. The world seemed to hold still as a tiny lump traveled down Jinta's throat. He sighed and patted his stomach.

"Thanks for the snack army bugs! That wasn't half--"

He was suddenly interrupted as a groaning sound emanated from his belly. He clutched it in discomfort and stared down at it. The bomb had apparently went off inside him. He groaned as his stomach churned and bubbled, the bomb's full fury being unleashed inside his body. Jinta felt his hands move watched in shock as his stomach slowly swelled, the sounds from within becoming louder and more intense. When his stomach was pressed tight against his shirt, the shirt itself starting to ride up he opened his mouth and belched loud and long, directly downward. The nuclear force inside his body changed and was released as a concentrated blast of pure energy which fell onto the city below him. Jinta's stomach slowly deflated back to it's original taught form and the nuclear blast fizzled out. Jinta sighed and patted his stomach again, happy that it settled down. He looked down at the city and was met with nothing but a smoking crater, no trace of his slaves or their pathetic dwellings left.

"Dammit! Look what you made me do! You army specks better not come near me again or I'll make you SUFFER!"

Jinta was more than annoyed at having his fun cut short at this city. He stepped on the ashy smudge until it was gone, the very sight of it making him angrier and angrier. He turned his attention to the next city and started off, determined to use them to their fullest.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Nuclear Power vs. God Power

choices: Grimmjow begins to change within the void.
Jinta's dominance doesn't seem to worry Aizen at all.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta was unbelievably pissed. Those army bugs had made him kill off and entire population of potential slaves. Now, he was heading for the next city to taker out his rage on them. There was a high probability that this city was going to be decimated too, because once you make Lord Jinta mad…lots of people are gonna die. As the young god marched toward the distant city, each step covering one mile after another, the inside of his body was changing in mysterious ways. The remaining radiation leftover in his gut made its way throughout his body where is bonded with the slime-infected cells. Two forces, one magical while the other scientific, mixed together and began to change their host. Jinta felt the familiar sensation of his body filling with raw energy. His angry scowl changed to a bright grin.

“Oh yeah, I know this feeling! I’m about to gro--” Jinta said with anticipation, but was interrupted when a horrible pain shot through his stomach. The boy hugged his stomach and fell to his knees, his weight creating a large earthquake that shook the area. Ichigo and Hisagi (who had both been placed in Jinta’s pocket before he swallowed the warhead) heard their master groaning in pain. They immediately climbed up the inside of the pocket until they reached the opening and looked up at their master’s face.

“Lord Jinta, what’s wrong?!”
“Are you in pain? What happened?”

Jinta cracked an eye opened and looked toward his slaves. Through his pain, he managed to say, “I think that nuke I ate is giving me indigestion. Urrrh!!” The pain just got worse as Jinta’s body began to give off a green glow. While he was growing, the different factors involved with this growth spurt meant the process took a greater toll on Jinta’s body. The results were defiantly going to be massive, though, that’s for sure.

The power within Jinta built up inside his gut…and then exploded. Jinta’s body expanded outward in a quick burst. It happened a second time, soon followed by a third burst. The sheer amount of spiritual pressure Jinta was giving off as he grew crated a crater around him. When the glow and pain faded, Jinta felt refreshed. The pain just vanished and the first thing he saw through his blurry eyes was that he was standing in the crater created by his spiritual pressure. He wasn’t focused on that, however, but his own body. Just by looking at his hands he could tell his size had increased. Jinta clenched his fists and stepped out of the crater to compare his new size with the rest of the world. The change was obvious; the town he was once looking at in the distance was now below him. It was still several miles away, but Jinta just had to take step forward. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Hisagi had been forced to the bottom of the pocket. Jinta’s pants had become so thick that they could no longer hold onto the edge of the pocket. Because of this, they couldn’t know just how big their god had become.

“I guess those army bugs are to thank for this. I guess nukes are like energy pills for gods! I’m glad I’m not green, though.” Jinta joked, turning his attention from his new size to the miniature city before him. The population had long since become aware of Jinta’s presence and were trying to flee. Jinta stepped forward and placed both his feet on either side of the city so it rested between them. Jinta smirked when noticed each of his feet were the same size as the city. He had more than doubled in size and could crush the city with a single stomp! Jinta spread his arms as he spoke to the city below him.

“Attention, specks! You’re all now property of GOD!” Jinta announced, putting his hands on his hips when he was done. “Actually, you bugs are so small that you barely count as specks! You’re almost germs!”

The people of this city weren’t paying him as much attention as the others, probably because their was no wall restricting them. Wall or not, these specks must have been brain damaged if they thought they had any chance of getting away. Jinta crouched down and positioned a hand over the city, casting it in darkness. Using his gravity powers, Jinta made every individual in the city float up toward his palm. It didn’t matter if they were being loyal and waiting for their fate, or being disobediently and trying to run; they were all his. Everyone was lifted off the streets, out of their homes, and even out of their vehicles. Jinta raised the population up to his face and smiled at them.

“You all may be small, but I can see the scared expressions on your faces quite clearly! Don’t be scared; you’ll like serving your god…until I get bored of you, that is.” Jinta laughed, blowing hot air at his immobilized slaves. Glancing at his pocket, Jinta pointed a finger at it and suddenly Ichigo and Hisagi found themselves flying in front of Jinta’s face with the other slaves. “Glad you could join the party.”

The two teens were in awe. Jinta had been a god of great size before…but he just kept getting bigger! His boyish, smirking face took up their entire field of vision. Most of the slaves around him were scared and crying, but the two of them simply smiled in joy. Jinta was their reason for living and seeing him this big brought them nothing but happiness.

“You bugs ready to work? I got two jobs for you and I think you all may just barely be enough to cover them.” Jinta used one of his fingers to split half the slaves into two groups and direct them toward his ears. To someone Jinta’s size, it would appear as if a bunch of tiny particles were flowing into his ears. “First of all, I want you specks to clean out my ears. A simple task; just toss all the gunk out!” Jinta gave the remaining slaves a smile and lifted his shirt up, exposing his bellybutton. The other half of the population flowed into his navel. “You guys can clean all the lint out of my navel.”

The slaves had been shown their master’s power and didn’t dare question it. Those in his ears began lifting big chunks of ear wax and tossing it outside. Those in his bellybutton rolled up large globs of lint and sweat and pushing them out the “cave”. Ichigo had been assigned to the right ear while Hisagi was in the navel. It was the Soul Reaper’s second time in the navel, and it was even bigger than before. It was equal in size to a city district.

As his slaves served him, Jinta sat down and spread his legs so the city was nestled between them. The tickling sensations coming from his ears and navel felt good. The giant kid leaned forward and began using his fingers to play with the city. Skyscrapers were toppled over, buildings turned to dust, craters made just by pressing his digits into the concrete. There was no one left in the city, but that didn’t mean he couldn’t cause some destruction. While he did this, Ichigo began to ask him something.

“My lord, forgive me for asking, but what do you plan on doing next?”

“Don’t know, carrot top. Maybe I’ll take a walk to Tokyo and turn the capital into a smoking ruin! Even better, maybe I’ll cross the sea and visit another country. I always wanted to use the Eiffel Tower as a tooth pick!” Jinta laughed as he thought of all the possibilities.

“Maybe you should show that false god, Grimmjow, who the boss is!”

“That would be fun,” Jinta replied as he mentally measured himself to the Arrancar’s last known size. With his new growth spurt, that false god would be about half his size. “but I think I’ll wait until I get even bigger! I’ll teach that pussy cat a lesson once I can hold him in the palm of my hand.” Jinta was thinking BIG. If he continued to grow, he may eventually outgrow the planet. It was best to have his fun with Mother Earth first before he became bored with the planet. If he got bored early, there was always Soul Society…

Meanwhile, elsewhere…

As Jinta enjoyed the sensations of his slaves working in his body, the sensations of total dominance, he was totally unaware of the force that was growing in the void between worlds. Grimmjow had been livid ever since his defeat at Jinta's hands. He had prowled around inside the void using any power that came to his mind to escape. Cero's were blasted, punches and kicks were thrown, he had even attempted to tear apart the fabric of space with his own hands. Unfortunately for him, even though he had powers that Jinta didn't, namely his ability to regenerate his body from damage, he didn't have the ability to rip open holes in space. He had worn himself out after a few hours of this exercise in futility. He was well and truly trapped.

"Dammit! If I ever get my hands on that kid I'm going to tear his heart out of his chest and let him watch it beat!" He muttered murderously to himself.

Grimmjow sat down in the void and just stared into space. At this time there was nothing he could do. For hours he just stared into the void, occasionally he'd wander about, wondering if his position in the void related in any way to his position in the real world. While Jinta was outside dominating the world he was trapped like an animal in a cage. It made him so angry! But there was little he could do.

Or so he thought. Almost immediately after Jinta's own transformation he himself started undergoing one. He felt it first as a tingling deep within him. The tingle deepened to a full fledged itching throughout his whole being. The slime was reacting in Grimmjow in a different manner than Jinta. Instead of his body increasing in size his muscles were bulking up, his chest expanding, his abs popping out in definition. His arms strained the sleeves of his coat while his legs filled his pants to the breaking point. His Hierro increased in hardness to the point that he was nigh impenetrable. He could feel new strength flowing through him. Unfortunately, it was strength that was useless to him, trapped in a void. The slime continued to change him, strengthening his powers more and more. His healing factor was improved as well though it would awhile before he could test it. His healing powers combined with his new and improved Hierro made him nearly invincible, much like a god. Jinta was a force to be reckoned with when compared with the humans, but to a being of equal size he was still just a pathetic kid.

Grimmjow felt his body start growing taller as well, his height inching (to him) slowly upward. His spiritual pressure was crushingly powerful. Even Jinta would quail under this ferocity. Grimmjow directed this fierce pressure against the void and saw it waver slightly. It appeared to be warping outward, unable to withstand the force of Grimmjow's presence. He forced the space further and further until sweat was beading on his forehead, his powers stretching to their maximum. Unfortunately, for him, he had to relent before he could tear through, the space bouncing back to its former shape. It was no use. He had begun much, much, more powerful but it still wasn't enough to break free. But soon enough he would have the strength necessary to escape from his prison and show Jinta who the real god was.
