Kisuke whipped out his fan and said, "Oh sure, that sounds like a great plan. Run right back to Jinta and have him rip you into tiny pieces, or throw you into the vacuum of space, or boil you in acid, or make you pleasure him, or make you rub his massive feet before crushing you, or..."

"Alright already! I get the point! What am I supposed to do then?"

Urahara smacked Ichigo on top of the head with his fan and said, "You're not listening Ichigo. Remember what I said just a few minutes ago? I didn't tell you that story about Hell and the Hell King for nothing."

Ichigo blinked and said, "Oh yeah...Hey! If I get that power I'll be able to stomp Jinta for good!" He grinned and slammed his fist into his other hand. "That's your plan right? Give me the Hell King's power so I can finish Jinta off?"

Kisuke smiled and said, "Exactly! Now you're thinking! But it's not going to be easy. You're not just going to be able to traipse down into Hell and steal the Hell King's power. There are nine circles to Hell, each circle guarded by a demon of vast power. The Hell King's throne is in the ninth and final circle, his power contained inside his throne. To get his power, you'll have to battle through each circle, defeat each demon guardian, and then shatter the throne to absorb the power that lies within it."

Ichigo's mouth dropped open. "You've gotta be kidding me! I can't do that! I don't even have Zangetsu with me! I won't stand a chance!"

"And yet you were so willing to go and try and beat Jinta who is billions of times more powerful than any demon in Hell. I'm not sending you in without help." He reached into his robe and pulled out a brightly glowing vial. "I still have some of that slime left over. This will give you enough power to help get you through Hell. The first few guardians will probably fall pretty easily to you after you ingest this. The ones after will be more difficult to take down. The one guarding the ninth circle...well, hopefully this slime is fast acting or you won't have it in you to kill him."

"I don't care how tough they are! Anything is better than being forced into servitude by that bastard!" Ichigo grabbed the vial and popped the cork out, downing it in one gulp. "How long will this stuff take to activate?"

Urahara pulled a watch out of his pocket and said, "Let's see...about fifteen minutes. I was working on refining it further while I was gone. Like your friends said, no matter how much of this slime you take you won't be able to reach Jinta, not even close, but it should be enough to get you to the power that can challenge Jinta. Now, I can't come with you since I'd just be a liability down there. So I'm going to reveal the gate and the rest is up to you."

Kisuke twisted the King's Key around until it had a warped shape. It glowed red and black, malevolence oozing from it like an evil miasma. "This...is the Devil's Key. It's made the same way as the King's Key but only one ever existed. The original Spirit King never wanted anyone to even try and claim Hell's power so he hid it away. When he died, I was able to find it and obtain it."

He turned and pointed the key at thin air. Fire erupted from the ground as everything around them grew dark, an oppressive air pressing down on them. Kisuke turned the key slowly and a loud clunking noise was heard, as if massive tumblers were turning in a gigantic lock. When the sound echoed into silence the fire coalesced until the Gates of Hell were visible, the two skeletal doorkeepers holding the handles. Urahara smiled and said, "There you go! Head on in!"

Ichigo stepped forward, sweating slightly. He didn't know what to expect on the other side of this door but he knew he had to overcome it, no matter what. He was about to touch the door when Kisuke suddenly said, "Oh! Two things before you go! One: The guardians of the circles all contain a tiny portion of the Devil's power. You're going to have to absorb each one as you go to get the full strength of the Hell King. Two: Jinta can't follow you. The Spirit King is unable to enter Hell and the Hell King is unable to enter the Spirit King's realm. In order to fight, you're going to both have to meet on the neutral ground of our universe. That's the only way you two can settle this. So, it's either stay in your own realms and let bygones be bygones for eternity, or fight. I'm sure you'll make the right choice Ichigo Kurosaki. Good luck~"

Ichigo kept all this in mind as he kicked the door, hard. "Hey! Open up! I want in!"

The gatekeepers slowly pulled open the doors, revealing a dark, swirling portal. The first circle awaited him. Without a second thought, Ichigo jumped into the portal, the doors slamming shut behind him. Urahara sighed and pulled his hat down over his eyes. "Well, it's all up to him now."
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: The Divine Comedy-Strawberry Style

choices: Jinta feels like something is wrong and heads back to his realm.
Ichigo conquers circle after circle, getting closer to his prize every time.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
The decent into Hell took a lot longer than Ichigo thought. The next ten minutes was a fast decent down a hellish tunnel. Around him, Ichigo could see flames and the outline of people flash by him. He wasn’t fully focused on the sights, however. He spent the entire ten minutes thinking about everything he had done while under Jinta’s influence. He had watched so many of his friends die, sat on the boy’s shoulder as he destroyed countless lives, and allowed him to ascend to God’s throne. Hisagi and Hitsugaya were under the same spell, and neither of them knew it. Ichigo knew he had to become the Hell King to set things right. Perhaps after Jinta was finally put down, he could absorb the power of the Spirit King and turn everything back to the way it was. Ichigo was reminded that he was falling when the scenery finally changed. he was spat out of the tunnel and saw ground quickly approaching. He braced himself and crashed into the ground, creating a large dust cloud.

“Ow…that…didn’t hurt as much as it should have, actually.” Ichigo said to himself as he stood up and dusted himself off. As the dust cleared, he took a gander at the realm around him. Hell looked pretty much like how he imagined it; pools of lava, a wasteland of brimstone, and a scorching heat. At first Ichigo thought he was alone, but was quickly corrected when the ground around him began to crack to life. Humanoid creatures began burrowing their way to the surface, having sensed the disturbance. These creatures were nor human or Hollow, but perhaps once were. Their faces looked like they were covered in masks of stone and their fingernails looked like someone had forgotten to cut their nails for a few years. When one of the demons approached Ichigo and spoke, the Soul Reaper saw that his mouth was not filled with teeth and a tongue, but a blackish void.

“How is this possible? You are here, and yet you are alive. This should not be…” the creature snarled, its eyes lighting up red.

“My name is Ichigo Kurosaki, I’m-”

“We don’t care who you are, mortal.” another demon interrupted him. “We only care that you are alive. A living soul…we are curious as to what it would taste like.”

Ichigo glared at the hungry-looking demons as he instinctively reached for his sword. When he remembered it wasn’t there, he muttered a curse as the group of demons roared and dove at him. Ichigo did the only other thing he could: turn around and run the hell away. The group of soul eaters were in fast pursuit, and their numbers seemed to multiply with every step. What was once a group of twenty or so demons had quickly become more than a hundred. Ichigo continued to run for his life, refusing to die just minutes after arriving.

“Come on, slime, hurry up! I’m not going to become dinner for a bunch of demons!”

After saying this, Ichigo looked ahead and spotted a second group of creatures. He stopped himself before he ran right into the demon’s hungry claws. Spinning around, his pursers caught up with him and surrounded him. There was no place for the orange haired teen to go; he was surrounded by snarling demons.

“Your presence here must mean that the seal on Hell’s gate must have been broken. After we have dealt with you, we will storm the world of the living and turn it into another Hell!”

The demons cried out as they charged for Ichigo. The former slave shut his eyes and waited for the pain to come, but instead felt a burst of power come from within him. He opened his eyes and smiled at the demons. The creatures slowed down as they noticed their prey begin tot rise. Ichigo’s body quickly grew and took up more space, forcing his opponents to step back. In just a matter of seconds, Ichigo had grown to the size where the once frightening demons now appeared like five-inch tall toys.

“Hmmm…good enough.” Ichigo commented a she examined his body. “I’m sure I’ll grow more along the way, this is good enough to deal with the small fry.”

“So, the mortal has a few tricks up his sleeve. No matter, a bigger you just means a bigger meal for us! Attack!” one of the demons yelled, signaling his companions to continue the charge. Ichigo got into his fighting stance and the fight began. While he lacked a blade, his fists and legs were the only weapons he needed. The horde of demonic creatures attempted to jump and attack him from everywhere, but Ichigo’s dodging and counter speed allowed him to fend off most of the attackers. It only took a swift punch or kick to dispatch a demon. If they weren’t killed on contact, they were probably killed when their body landed after being sent into the distance. Before long, Ichigo made short work of the demons and he was surrounded by their broken carcasses.

“Now that their taken care of, time for the guardian.” Ichigo looked at the ground and spotted a surviving demon. He grinned and snatched him up, bringing him to his face. “Where’s the guardian of this circle?”

“T-the g-guardian?”

“Yes, t-the g-guardian.” Ichigo repeated, mocking the demon’s stuttering. “Tell me where he is so I can kick his ass!”

“I…I…”

“Spit it out!”

“I’m the guardian!”

Ichigo stared at the small demon for a few moments before covering his mouth with his free hand to suppress his laughs.

“YOU? You Don’t look any different from the other wimps!”

“Don’t group me with them, mortal! My battle skills outclass everyone on this circle, so I was given the privilege of being its guardian!”

“Sure, sure…” Ichigo chuckled a bit more. “Well, let’s see your skills.” The giant opened his fist and let the demon fall to the ground, hitting the brimstone with his demonic buttocks. “I’ll make the first move.”

“Wha-?” The guardian started to say, before he was forever silenced by the giant’s huge bare foot. He did even get the chance to get off his butt,

“That was easy enough…” Ichigo said as he picked his foot off the flattened demon. He watched the squashed remains turn into a black mist that flew up and sank into Ichigo’s chest. A black tint covered Ichigo as he felt a new power inside him. “This power…it reeks of the most evil spiritual energy I’ve ever sensed. This has to be part of the Hell King’s power.”

The giant Soul Reaper scanned the ground and saw one of the defeated demons twitching. He scooped him into his hand and brought him up to his eyes. The demon’s legs had been nicked by one of his punches, shattering them and leaving him immobile.

“You, how do I get to the second circle?”

“Uhh…well…there’s a giant hole to the east that leads to the second circle. Each level has one and it’s the only way to get to each floor.”

“Thanks.” Ichigo mumbled before chucking the demon over his shoulder and began walking east. He soon reached the edge of the hole the demon had spoken of. Ichigo peered down into it and saw nothing but a black abyss. Without a second thought, Ichigo leaped into the hole and continued with his trials. Something told him their would be A LOT of falling during these trials…
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Welcome to Hell

choices: Ichigo continues on through Hell
Jinta continues having fun with his slaves
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Ichigo headed down into the Second Circle of Hell, where the demons were bigger, stronger, and more numerous. As Ichigo continued down his journey Jinta was still having fun with the Earth. He had picked it up, tossed it around, ate it, crushed it underneath every part of his body, and he still wasn't bored. He was about to crush it between his toes for the tenth time when he felt a sudden uneasiness rush through him. He had no way of knowing it, but Ichigo had crushed the second guardian. With every bit of power that was added to Ichigo, Jinta felt an emotion that he hadn't felt for a long time: Uneasiness. It was not a full fledged fear. Jinta felt like he could never be afraid again. His mind had been hardened and strengthened by surviving the Infinity Corp. But he still didn't like this feeling. It felt like something was coming up from behind him. The hairs on the back of his neck prickled. The longer he tried to ignore it, the more it prickled. Finally, after Ichigo bested the third guardian, Jinta finally got fed up with it and decided to go back to his realm to figure out what was going on.

"Listen up you microbes!" He addressed the planet. "I'm leaving you to take care of some business! When I get back I'm going to keep playing with you! So don't go anywhere!"

He bellowed with laughter as he said this. The humans could understand his laughter. There was no place they could go to escape the young vengeful god. No place in the universe was safe. Jinta blinked out of existence and reappeared in his realm, directly in front of his throne. Hisagi and Hitsugaya jumped as Jinta suddenly reappeared. Jinta frowned as he saw that Ichigo was missing, his unease growing as Ichigo finished off the fourth guardian.

"Where is carrot top?" Jinta asked in a low, dangerous voice.

Hitsugaya and Hisagi immediately threw themselves on their stomachs and began babbling an explanation, scared by the expression on their Lords face. Jinta's face darkened further and he shouted, "SHUT UP!"

His voice wrapped around Hitsugaya and Hisagi and froze their bodies and voices. Jinta pointed at Hitsugaya and said, "Snowy! Tell me what happened!"

Hitsugaya was able to sit up and speak. "It was Kisuke Urahara. He came from out of nowhere claiming to be surrendering to you. We assumed he was sincere since trying anything against you at this point in time would be useless. Unfortunately, he kidnapped Ichigo! I think he's planning on using him to unleash the power of Hell on you!"

Jinta's eyebrow arched as he said, "Hell? What are you talking about?"

He pointed at Hisagi who said, "Urahara talked about a power that could rival God's. It was that of the "Devil", a being that fought with the original Spirit King. He lost and was sealed in his throne in Hell. Eventually, only his power remained. We believe Urahara is using Ichigo to reclaim that power and use it to fight against you!"

Jinta snorted and laughed. He kept laughing, holding his stomach as it began to hurt. When tears were starting to stream down his face he sighed and said, "That's a good one! Even if carrot top got a power that could rival the original Spirit Bug I'm a lot more powerful than he ever was! I'm infinite! Nothing can stand up to me! Carrot top's just going to have to get beat down again."

He cracked his knuckles with a grin as he said this, the growing uneasiness replaced with growing excitement. Now that he knew what was coming he wanted to face Ichigo again on semi equal terms. His defiance would be a refreshing reminder of the old days when he played with Ichigo like a toy instead of dominating him like a bug. Eventually he'd get bored and drain off the power that Ichigo gained and everything would be back as it was. He stretched and said, "I can't believe I was getting all worked up over something so stupid."

He crossed his arms as he looked down at his remaining slaves. "Move."

He waited exactly six seconds, watching his slaves scramble in opposite directions to avoid their god's giant ass coming down on them. Jinta settled into his throne and said, "Man, torturing and playing with the Earth really took it out of me."

He reached down on either side of him and lifted his minuscule slaves up to his face. "I'm down one slave so you two each get a foot to yourself!"

He laughed and dropped them down, the slaves floating down to his feet. He stuck them out in front of the former Soul Reapers and said, "Get to work! Whoever finishes first gets to help me with something else! Whoever loses, gets punished underneath my foot!"

This was all it took to spur his slaves into action. They would have gladly serviced their master's foot without the threat of punishment. Nothing could hurt them worse than the thought that they had failed their god. So they threw themselves into their work, wanting to move on and help Lord Jinta with whatever he needed.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: What, Jinta Worry?

choices: He looked worried.
He didn't look worried at all.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
It took Ichigo quite a long time to descend through Hell. Keeping track of time was difficult, but it was a good guess to think that he’d been down here at least three days. Most of that time was spent searching for each circle’s guardian, who was always a weak little thing that was too chicken to approach the giant Ichigo. Urahara had greatly underestimated him…

Finally, only the final 9th circle was left. It was the smallest floor and not a soul lived down there. It was a frozen wasteland enveloped in silence. That several thousand year silence was finally broken when out of the large hole in the ceiling fell a lone figure. The figure smashed into the ground, creating a loud boom that echoed through the realm and covered him in a white cloud. Two red eyes peered out of the cloud and the owner of those eyes slowly walked out of the smokescreen. In seconds, Ichigo’s entire form was revealed to the empty floor.

The teenager had undergone a grand transformation during his time in Hell. His orange hair, once short and spiky, was now wild and drooped down to his waist. He had grown so much in size and muscle that the last guardian he had defeated was the size of gnat. Most of his clothes had torn off, save for his tight pants that were starting to show signs of tearing. The Substitute Soul Reaper’s eyes had the ability to turn red at any time and his teeth were razor sharp, putting even Grimmjow to shame.

Ichigo walked through the 9th circle for several minutes until his eyes fell upon his ultimate goal. There, at the center of a frozen lake, was the throne of the Hell King. Unlike the Spirit King’s throne, it was not elegant or beautiful at all. It looked like it had been built in three minutes and was starting to fall apart, but Ichigo didn’t care. He had come here to get the throne’s power and become a being to rival Jinta; nothing more.

“Just one more guardian and I’m done…” Ichigo muttered to himself as he scanned the base of the throne, thinking the guardian was hiding somewhere at its base. As he approached it, he suddenly felt a piercing pain in his chest. The orange haired teen’s eyes bulged as he grabbed his chest in agony. The pain was unbearable…like something inside him was trying to dig its way out…

Ehehehehe…

Ichigo became surrounded in a red glow as he fell to his knees. His eyes turned bright red as his arms flew outward and a strange, white goo emerged from his chest. The slime-like substance flowed out of him like torrent from a hose and collected onto the throne. Slowly the white substance began to shape itself. First arms became visible, than legs, a torso, a head. When the figure had fully formed, Ichigo peered up into the smiling face of…himself. His white-skinned self.

“Howdy, king. Kneeling before me already?” his Hollow self joked, smirking amusingly. Ichigo glared at the Hollow angrily as he got to his feet. He didn’t just look like him, he looked like his current appearance. The long hair, sharp teeth, bare torso, everything.

“How? I thought Jinta-”

“You thought Jinta trapped me? Don’t make me laugh, Soul Reaper! As you absorbed the Hell King’s power and grew in power, so did I! I managed to break out of that weak barrier days ago, but I’ve been waiting silently as you absorbed even more power. You didn’t noticed, did you? You never noticed that you were only getting HALF what you took!

Ichigo’s expression turned into shock. This awesome power he had…it was only half of what he should have? He already felt like he could challenge Jinta!

“So, I guess that makes you the last guardian, right? I defeat you and all of the Hell King’s power becomes mine?”

“Not exactly. I don’t know what happened to the last guardian, but it looks like he got bored of guarding the last circle where no one ever came. He sealed his portion of the Hell King’s power…inside this!”

Hollow Ichigo cackled insanely as he gripped the armrests of the throne. Almost immediately the throne glowed with a dark spiritual energy that flowed into his Hollow self through is arms. The white skinned Ichigo’s eyes turned red and Ichigo though he saw sparks of energy crackle from them. His inner Hollow threw his head back as the power surge ended, as if just climaxing. Ichigo watched the teenage-looking being chuckle as he picked himself off the throne and stood before Ichigo.

“Yeeeaah, now I’m the king, baby!” Hollow Ichigo yelled as he clenched his fists and looked over himself. “See me now, Soul Reaper? We’re no longer equal! I have more of the Hell King’s power in me then you, so there’s no way you can win! I’ll take the power you absorbed, stomp Lord Jinta for trapping me in that prison, and send the entire universe into chaos!”

The mad demon laughed manically, the very volume of his voice cracking the lake around them. When he was finished, he peered at Ichigo and saw that…
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Know Thyself

choices: Ichigo calls Jinta out and they battle on neutral ground; the universe
Something interupts both of them.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
As the monstrous being before him cackled madly Ichigo merely crossed his arms and looked unimpressed. His Hollow self looked at Ichigo in surprise and said, "Hmph...You're not worried at all! You're not screaming! You're not fighting! You're not doing anything! What's the matter with you?!?"

Ichigo smirked and said, "I was just waiting for you to finish making a fool of yourself. I think it's hilarious that you think you can even put up a fight against me."

The white skinned Ichigo snorted and started laughing again. "Such bravado! I suppose I should expect if from the likes of you. You've always managed to put me away before but now what gives you such confidence? I have the majority of the Hell King's power! I know how to use it in ways you've never even dreamed! So what makes you think you can stop me this time?"

Ichigo laughed himself now. "Dream on! While you've been trapped behind that barrier I've been hanging around with Jinta! I've seen him, Hitsugaya, Hollows, Grimmjow and even Renji for awhile using these kinds of powers! I know more about them than you ever could!"

Hollow Ichigo suddenly dashed forward and punched Ichigo as hard as he could in the stomach. His speed was blinding. Ichigo grunted and spat up blood, the force of the punch rupturing some of his internal organs. The demonic creature laughed wildly and said, "See?!? SEE?!?!? You're weak! You're pathetic! You're nothing more than a bug to me! I'm going to rip you to shreds and suck out the last vestiges of power you have!"

Ichigo laughed weakly and said, "Wow...I can't believe it..."

"Awww, are you finally realizing that you were incredibly foolhardy to even THINK of challenging me?" the Hollow mocked.

Ichigo shook his head and said, "I can't believe...you fell for it!"

The smirk was wiped off Hollow Ichigo's face as he felt a massive kick hit the back of his head. He went flying forward, skidding across the ice, slamming into the wall. Ichigo cracked his knuckles and said, "Part of the Hell King's power is the powers of sin! I created a clone of myself using the power of Deceit! You were so busy gloating that you didn't even realize I was hiding right behind you."

The cloned Ichigo disappeared while Ichigo slowly moved towards his Hollow self. He was laying on the ground in a daze, the kick muddling his mind. He knew he had to move, to think fast or else Ichigo would continue to beat on him but he couldn't seem to string two coherent thoughts together. Ichigo grabbed the creature by the throat and slammed him against the wall. He began to pummel him, punching him at every available point, his punches strengthened by a demonic power, making his fist harder, faster, and stronger. "And now..*Punch* I'm using....*Whack* The power of *Smash* Treachery!"

His last punch smashed Hollow Ichigo in the face, breaking several teeth and smashing his nose into a bloody stump. He was in horrible shape, his arms and legs broken, his organs obliterated, his insides bleeding. He did indeed have more power than Ichigo...but he had failed to use it when he had the chance and was now unable to do anything to defend himself. Ichigo grinned as he held up the hand that wasn't holding his Hollow self. It glowed black and he said, "And now...I'll use the power of Envy...and take what's yours!"

He slammed his hand against the broken being before him and began to draw out the power that dwelt inside. Swiftly the once fierce creature before him began to dwindle in size until he was nothing more than a broken bug pinned to the wall. Ichigo drew out the last of the Hell King's power within him and shuddered. Such power...it was filling him to overflow! He had never felt such power! He felt like he could take on anyone and win with ease! Without a second thought he smashed the pathetic creature that he was holding and walked over to the throne. His other self had drained most of the power out of the throne and Ichigo had subsequently drained that power from him so there was only a few vestiges of power left in the throne. However, Ichigo wasn't about to let such delicious power go to waste. He sat on the throne and gripped the hand rests tightly, dark energy surging out of the weak structure and filling his body with a malevolent power. Ichigo started growing as he devoured the last of the Hell King's power, his bulk causing the throne to buckle and smash until he had crushed it completely under his body. He grinned and looked himself over. He looked the same, just much bigger, his muscles bulging, but the power he felt inside was limitless. He knew that Jinta would be nothing more than a child to him again. With the same powers, he was older, more experienced as a fighter, and more determined to win against the giant brat. He wasn't going to lose!

Meanwhile, as Ichigo ascended, Jinta felt a foreboding presence in the back of his mind. He shivered involuntarily and said, "What the hell was that?"

Hitsugaya and Hisagi, who were still rubbing their god's feet, looked up at Jinta seemed distracted. They couldn't sense anything so they had no idea what was wrong. Jinta stared into space for awhile trying to determine what the feeling was but couldn't. He got frustrated and crossed his arms, glaring down at his slaves. "Hey! Stop gawking and pick up the pace! I'm in a bad mood and might just punish you both if you don't work up to my standards!"

The two slaves instantly went back to work, massaging as much of the massive foot as they could. Still...Jinta couldn't shake the feeling that something was up. He knew Ichigo was trying to beat him...but he had never expected to feel a power so much like his own. Could he be...equal to him? Jinta shook his head. No! What a stupid thought! No one in this or any universe was as powerful as he was! When that pathetic slave of his finally arrived to fight, he would destroy him completely and suck out that ridiculous power that had so troubled his predecessor! All he had to do...was wait.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: It Would Take a Devil to Beat a God

choices: The battle begins, with Ichigo gaining the upper hand.
The battle begins, with Jinta gaining the upper hand.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
“No point in waiting around!” Ichigo shouted to the empty circle as he stepped away from the rubble of the word down throne. Despite is words, Ichigo did not leave Hell immediately. Wanting to reassure himself of the fact that he could thrash Jinta once and for all, the new Hell King summoned a giant mirror of crystal. The god-like demon stood in front of the mirror and looked himself over. He was no longer a Substitute Soul Reaper. He was no longer a human. He was no longer part Hollow. He was something else…something that lacked a name. After flexing a bit and seeing that his new form was perfect in every way possible, Ichigo snapped his fingers and vanished just like that. He did not poof out of existence like Jinta, but disappeared in a burst of black fire. The sheer force of his exit was so powerful that it tore a crater into the ninth circle. Every soul in the realm felt their King leave.

Ichigo reappeared somewhere in the depths of space, far away from any celestial body he knew of. It was a completely different galaxy. Ichigo folded his arms over his chest and thought about how he was going to call the Spirit King here. Why not just tell him where he was? Or show him? Ichigo did just that and began releasing as much of his spiritual pressure as possible. His evil and dark spiritual energy washed over the galaxy, drenching any planets and stars in came across. Anything his spiritual pressure touched was doomed to die. Unfortunately for the civilizations that happened to populate this galaxy; their deaths were not quick. Ichigo’s spiritual pressure did not simply crush the planets, it singed them like an invisible fire. People found themselves bursting into flames for no apparent reason. They watched their forests, their homes, and even their water sources combust into fire. After just one minute of releasing his spiritual pressure, every planet within the first four solar systems were turned into black orbs of ash that broke to pieces if Ichigo so much as sniffed.

Meanwhile, Jinta was leaning back in his throne with his eyes closed trying to figure out what was bugging him so much. Suddenly, his eyes shot open and he leaned up as if he had just woken up from a bad dream. Hisagi and Toshiro were oblivious to their lord’s troubled mind and kept on rubbing his foot.

“Move.” Jinta commanded for the second time that day. His two saves scurried out of the way to avoid being squashed when Jinta placed both his bare feet onto the floor. Once the new Spirit King was standing, he looked down at his two servants and said, “I’m heading out again. You two wait there for me.”

“What?!” Hisagi shouted in disbelief. “No, Lord Jinta! Please don’t leave us again! Why can’t you take us with you?”

“I don’t need a couple bugs to look after while I want to have some fun. I only played with Earth the last time, and there’s a whole universe out there for me to toy with.”

“B-but, master, it’s so hard being away from you! We need you as much as we need food or water!” Hitsugaya pleaded, dropping to his knees by the god’s giant toes. Jinta shot the white-haired boy an angry glare that sent shivers down his spine.

“Are you actually putting your needs above mine? You wanna be punished, snowball?”

“N-no! Forgive me, Lord Jinta! I’m sorry, I’m a fool.” Hitsugaya blurted out, bowing before his lord and master. Jinta sighed and knelt down to get a closer look at his slaves. They were trying to hide it, but both of them looked tired and hungry. Jinta waved one of his hands over the floor and, out of nowhere, a giant plate with a single giant rice ball appeared.

“You both haven’t eaten in awhile. Chow down on this while I’m gone.”

“Th…thank you, Lord Jinta.” Hitsigaya said, bowing again. He and Hisagi ran over to the giant plate and grabbed handfuls of the giant snack.

“This is delicious, master! Your generosity is, like everything else about you, unmatched!” Hisagi praised as he took another bite. When he looked back up, however, he noticed Jinta was already gone…

The red haired deity tracked down the source of the overwhelming spiritual pressure and warped close to it. It didn’t take him long to notice the huge figure in front of him. The figure had his back turned to him with his long hair flowing as if it was caught in a breeze. When he noticed Jinta’s presence, the figure stopped releasing his spiritual pressure and turned to face Jinta with a toothily grin.

“It’s about time, brat!” Ichigo exclaimed. “I was starting to think you weren’t getting my message.”

“Ha! You may as well hold up a big sign saying ‘Here I am, come get me’.” Jinta replied, giving Ichigo a similar grin. Both titans stared at each other in silence before a sigh from Jinta broke it. “I’m really disappointed in you, carrot top. You were my most loyal slave, and now look at you. What did that bastard Urahara do to you?”

“He simply freed me from the spell you put me under. We were never truly following you; you had us under some kind of hypnosis!” Ichigo pointed a finger at Jinta as he declared this. Jinta, however, just shrugged.

“I don’t know what your talking about, carrot top. You followed me because you knew I was bigger, stronger, and more powerful than you could ever be. You knew that it was either following me or ending up dead. You made the wise choice.”

“Whatever. It doesn’t matter anymore! I’m going to pay you back for everything you did to Earth, to Soul Society, and to me! You climbed to the top, now I’m knocking you back down and burying you! Once I kill you, I’ll rip apart your soul so you can’t even go to Hell! The great and almighty Jinta…gone! Like he never even existed.”

“Keep dreaming, carrot top! I’m taking that new power from you and turning you back into a sniveling slave. That’s what’s going to happen, and nothing you do is going to change that.”

The Spirit King, Jinta Hanakari. The Hell King, Ichigo Kurosaki. The two titans got into their fighting stances and glared at each other. Ichigo glared at his former master. Jinta glared at his former slave. One of these two kings would be left standing to decide the fate of the universe. The other…well…
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: The Final Battle

choices: Jinta breaks free and turns the tide of the battle
Ichigo doesn't give Jinta an inch. He keeps beating him down
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
The two stared at each other, feeling each other out, their bodies tense with inaction, preparing themselves for whatever happened. Both of them had devastating powers at their disposal that could be activated with a mere thought. Anything could happen. Finally, Jinta made the first move! He charged forward, preparing to punch Ichigo in the face but his fist met with a powerful barrier. Ichigo smirked and grabbed Jinta's head, slamming it down on his knee. Jinta's nose connected with the appendage and burst into a flower of blood. He stumbled back and held his streaming nose glaring at Ichigo. The orange haired teen didn't let up. He ran forward and punched Jinta as hard as he could in the gut, his fist strengthened by his massive spiritual pressure. The air was forced from Jinta's lungs, blood splattering out of his mouth and speckling Ichigo's body. Ichigo laughed and said, "Some God you turned you to be! You're already coughing up blood and I haven't even broken a sweat!"

"S-shut up carrot top! I'm just getting warmed up!" Jinta held his hands out in front of Ichigo and pushed him back with his gravity powers. Ichigo was flung backward, crashing through planets, stars, solar systems, galaxies, his body tearing through them like they were paper, before coming to a halt a distance away. Before he could recover and do anything a fist appeared next to him and slammed him across the face, but didn't stop there. Fists appeared from all directions, crashing into Ichigo's body, bruising it, cutting him in places where the knuckle grazed, the fists powered by his own spiritual pressure. Jinta smirked from his position far away, watching as Ichigo's body was pushed around by his fists. With a grin he jumped up into the air, made a portal open beneath him, and slammed both of his feet, hard, onto Ichigo's head. Ichigo stopped his body from plummeting too far down in the void of space and glared up at Jinta who was laughing at him. "See? Told ya so!"

Ichigo held up his hand and shouted, "By the sin of Lust, I command you to come over here!"

It wasn't the perfect incantation but it served it's purpose. Jinta felt his body obeying a compulsion that wasn't his own, forcing him to plummet after Ichigo at break neck speed. He couldn't stop himself as Ichigo kicked him, hard, in the stomach. Jinta was flung back but only a few feet before getting tugged back towards Ichigo. A kick slammed into his face, forcing him back once more. Every punch and kick that hit Jinta forced him back but the compulsion of Lust kept bringing him closer to Ichigo, his body unable to move itself. Jinta spit out a tooth that got kicked loose and shouted, "STOP IT!"

Luckily for him, the power of his voiced orders had enough authority over Ichigo to stop the Lust spell. Jinta wiped his mouth, his face pretty badly bruised and said, "Not bad slave. Looks like you picked up some new tricks. But just try and stop this!"

He held his hands out and started cutting space and time around Ichigo, forming a barrier around him. Jinta brought his hands together, the barrier contracting around Ichigo, slowly crushing him. Jinta grinned at his success only to have that grin turn to a look of shock as Ichigo shouted, "Sin of Pride! Reflect!"

The barrier expanded and turned inside out, twisting away from Ichigo and forming around Jinta! The only thing that stopped Jinta from getting crushed was his quick cutting, making a hole in the barrier before it crushed him. He glared at Ichigo who had crossed his arms, a smile on his face. "You're a worse God than the Spirit King ever was! He at least managed to seal the Hell King in their fight. All you've done so far is get your ass kicked!"

Ichigo laughed at that while Jinta fumed, his anger at Ichigo growing. "Don't count me out yet bug! I'll show you!"

Despite the fact that Jinta was bruised, broken, and bloodied, he still had his fierce determination which had helped him out many times before in these kinds of fights. His indomitable will to survive had kept him going against even the toughest of opponents. He got into a fighting stance and charged, aiming a punch at Ichigo's face again. Ichigo rolled his eyes and held his hand out. "Sin of Greed! Barrier!"

Jinta's fist slammed into a powerful barrier once again. Now he knew what had stopped in the beginning of the fight. He kicked out but hit the same barrier. "Dammit! I'm going to kill you!" Jinta screamed in a rage. Ichigo pulled back and punched through the barrier, hitting Jinta in the face once again. "Give it up kid! The only reason you won so many damn times against me was because you were so much bigger than me! On equal footing you're just a snot nosed brat who bit off more than he could chew in pissing me off!"

Ichigo grabbed Jinta by the collar and punched him again and again, raining blows down over his body. Jinta was losing...badly. But he still refused to give up! He had gone into this fight blindly, without knowing what Ichigo's powers were. Now that he did know...a plan was forming in his mind. A plan of retaliation!
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Rage Across the Heavens

choices: Jinta begins to grow, but Ichigo can grow too.
Ichigo uses the Sin of Pride to reverse Jinta's growth, shrinking him instead.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Ichigo gave Jinta one last punch to his face before putting a stop to the beating. He took a moment to gaze over Jinta and smirked at what he saw. Jinta was bruised all over, his face especially ruined. The teen sported a black eye, split lip, and a mouth that was missing one or two teeth. Ichigo cackled as he squeezed the boy’s throat harder, causing him even more pain. Since they were both such godly beings, they no longer required oxygen to survive. Ichigo wasn’t going to kill Jinta by lack of air, but his strong hold did threaten to snap his neck.

“You look terrible, brat. Those were punches fueled by the power of Treachery! How did they feel, my former master?”

“Barely…felt a thing.” Jinta replied, smirking. Ichigo glared at the overconfident boy and clenched his fist. Jinta watched the Hell King’s hand burst into black flames, casting an eerie shadow on Ichigo’s demonic face.

“These are the Flames of Wrath. Once punch fueled by these suckers is gonna feel like ten of those punches I just gave you!” Ichigo warned. Jinta, however, still didn’t sway.

“Do your worse, carrot top!” Jinta exclaimed as he raised his left hand. Before he could do anything with it, Ichigo grabbed it with his other hand. As his hand held Jinta’s around the wrist, the Flames of Wrath burned the flesh and made Jinta clench his teeth.

“Haha! In a few seconds, your hand’s going to be burnt to a crisp!”

“We’ll see about that!” Jinta screamed in Ichigo face right before he suddenly kneed him in the crotch. Ichigo’s eyes bulged out of his head as he howled in pain and released Jinta. His hands immediately flew down to his family jewels and covered them. No matter how much of a deity-like being he was, Ichigo was still male…

“Did that hurt?” Jinta asked sarcastically as he looked at Ichigo’s pained expression. “Nah, couldn’t have! You’re the big bad Hell King! I bet this won’t hurt either!” Jinta cracked a grin and kicked Ichigo right in his covered crotch. Ichigo screamed again as the blow sent him backwards. Jinta didn’t let him go very far, however, and flew after him. He caught the older man by his leg and stopped him in his tracks. As all the blood rushed to Ichigo’s head, Jinta waved his hand and formed a small “room” of warped space around them. He then began thrashing Ichigo around the room, smacking him into the walls, the floor, and the ceiling numerous times. Ichigo, who was still nauseous from the double blow to his weak spot, could only endure the blows. After the fifteenth impact, the room couldn’t take anymore and shattered into tiny fragments. Jinta kept his firm grip on Ichigo’s ankle and held him upside-down.

“You understand now, carrot top? You mess with me…” Jinta grabbed Ichigo’s other ankle and spread his legs apart. He then positioned his foot so it was at the perfect angle to stomp Ichigo where it really hurt. “…and you get nothing but pain!”

“No!!!” Ichigo cried out just as Jinta brought his foot down. Before it could hit its target, it hit something else. Jinta looked down in confusion to see a small, concentrated barrier blocking his foot. Jinta snarled in annoyance and tried to force his foot through the barrier, but it’s smaller form made it very durable. The pain in Ichigo’s stomach began to subside and he took this opportunity to swing himself at Jinta, grabbing his own legs. The muscle bound devil pulled, surprising Jinta enough to release his own legs.

“Annoying pest!!” Ichigo shouted as he tossed Jinta away. Jinta easily regained his balance, but when he looked up at Ichigo he saw him directly in front of him with his finger touching his forehead. “Sin of Sloth! Disable!”

Jinta felt every fiber of his being freeze in place. He couldn’t move his arms, legs, or even his eyes. He could only look directly in front of him as Ichigo wrapped his fist in the Flames of Wrath and reared it back. The next second, Ichigo had the same fist buried into Jinta gut. Strangely, despite his pervious warning, Jinta didn’t feel a thing. Hell, the blow hadn’t even budged him an inch!

Flames of Wrath? More like Flames of Sissy!

Jinta mentally laughed. When he could move again, he was going to show this bug what a real punch felt like. Ichigo smirked at Jinta and waved as if to say “see ya”. Why was he…?

“GAAH!!!” Jinta spat out blood as the effects of disable wore off. His stomach pushed into his body as if an invisible fist had collided with it. The next thing he knew, he was spiraling backwards through space. Just as Ichigo before him, planets and other solar systems were brushed aside as his body crashed into them like a missile. Jinta only managed to stop himself by digging his fingers into the wall of reality and using it to slow him down. When he finally came to a halt, he had made several huge tears in space and time.

Jinta clutched his stomach and glanced down at it. It looked as if he had just been stamped with a searing hot piece of metal. His once perfect abs were barely visible now; as if they had been smoothed right off.

“Bastard!” Jinta cursed through his teeth. He glared over at Ichigo, who was slowly approaching him and cracking his knuckles as he went. Jinta decided it was about time to show him that his pesky Hell King powers were nothing compared to his own abilities. “Keep on smirking, carrot top, you should know by now how I end all my battles. I grow until my opponent is nothing but a bug at my feet!”
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Pain, Pain, and More Pain

choices: Jinta finally finishes Ichigo
Ichigo manages to escape
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Jinta grinned as he imagined himself growing into a colossus that could crush Ichigo with a single step. How wonderful it would be to smash Ichigo into paste under his single toe, drain all of his insignificant powers into himself, and teach Ichigo a lesson he'd never forget. His body slowly started growing, his height doubling in seconds, then tripling. Ichigo stopped as he saw the teen suddenly expand high above him. He smirked and shook his head. "What an idiot..."

He held up his hand and simply said, "Sin of Pride! Reflect!"

Jinta's growth instantly halted. The teen looked around in shock, wondering just the hell had happened. Before he could even begin to guess, his body swiftly began shrinking, passing down, down, down, until he was as tall as Ichigo...and he continued to shrink! Ichigo, using his powers of Pride, had gained control of Jinta's growing power and was using it against him. He could shrink him down as much as he wanted. Unfortunately, after he stopped using the power, he would be able to grow back to any height he wanted. Ichigo would have to move fast. Jinta continued to shrink down, his body half Ichigo's size, than a quarter of it, shrinking down until he was up to Ichigo's ankle. He slowed the shrinking down, so that Jinta was only losing centimeters instead of inches and feet. He looked down on Jinta and said, "Now you're becoming the bug you really are! How does it feel? You put so many other people in this position, so how does it feel to be the one facing down a foot?"

Ichigo picked up his foot and hovered it over Jinta. Jinta looked up, not impressed by Ichigo's threat. "Yeah, so what? It's just a stupid foot! It's nothing like my godly foot It's the foot of a powerless, subordinate, SLAVE!"

Ichigo moved his foot and held his hand out over Jinta. "Fine. Then I guess I'll have to show you what I mean first hand!"

Jinta began to rapidly shrink after this. His body dwindled past Ichigo's toes, the toes themselves turning into monolithic structures that stretched high into the sky above Jinta, each one stretching seemingly endlessly to either side of him. Jinta could tell, through his godly senses, that was he was shrinking down to human size, a size so tiny that Ichigo was an incomprehensible being of supreme size and power. Jinta couldn't see anything beyond the one, massive toe in front of him. He gulped a little, his heart racing just a bit faster. Ichigo was huge and he couldn't change his size...but he still had other powers! Ichigo wasn't going to crush him today. He was about to open a door into space when Ichigo's voice boomed down from on high, loud and rumbling like thunder, a voice of such commanding presence that Jinta couldn't help but stop and listen.

"SEE? HOW DOES IT FEEL TO BE THE HUMAN UNDER A SO CALLED GOD? NOW...JUST STAY STILL AND DIE!"

The humongous toe disappeared from Jinta's eye sight, the entire foot rising high, high above him. Jinta could see the entire sole, Ichigo raised it so high. Beyond the sole, he could barely make out the towering leg rising far above his sight. Jinta, for the first time, realized what it was like to be an insignificant being, helpless, about to be crushed under a foot of mind boggling size. The appendage hovered unmoving for what felt like an eternity then...started falling with great force toward him! Jinta panicked, freezing. Then, his mind gave him a swift kick. What was he doing? He was a GOD! He held up his hands and ripped them down, tearing a big hold in space. He dove through it and ripped another hole, appearing high above Ichigo. He watched as Ichigo forced his foot down, making a barrier under his foot, grinding it down. He smiled, satisfied that he had obliterated Jinta. He held up his hand and said, "Sin of Envy! Absorb!"

He was attempting to absorb the powers Jinta had. By destroying his body, the power had to go somewhere. Ichigo was going to absorb it, enter the Spirit King's realm and collect Renji and Hitsugaya. Then, he could go about setting things right again. This whole nightmare would finally, FINALLY, be over. Unfortunately for him, he had no idea that he had completely failed in killing Jinta. The red haired boy snickered as he watched Ichigo. Now it was time for him to get the drop on Ichigo and take him out. He cracked his knuckles and began to grow. In space, he cast no shadow so as he grew and grew and grew without Ichigo noticing. He suppressed his Spiritual Pressure, wanting to hide himself until the right moment. Ichigo was becoming less and less to him, his body becoming a speck, then less than a speck. Jinta finally believed he had grown enough and let his Spiritual Pressure flow out. Ichigo was floored by it, unable to move. Jinta spoke a single command. "Come here."

Ichigo's tiny body was bound by Jinta's words. He rose up before Jinta's face, staring into the eye of one who would definitely, surely, kill him. Jinta smirked and said, "ONCE A SLAVE, ALWAYS A SLAVE CARROT TOP! NOW...THE ONLY QUESTION IS, HOW DO I DEAL WITH YOU?"
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.title: Pride Before the Fall

choices: Jinta heads back to his realm, revives Ichigo, and begins his punishment.
Jinta heads back to Earth and Kisuke finally confronts him face-to-face.
1522122212211122211211111112211111222212.content:
Ichigo simply floated there in front of God’s giant eye. He couldn’t speak nor could he even think; as if his mind couldn’t comprehend the sudden change in the situation. Why was Jinta still alive? Why wasn’t he a stain on the bottom of his foot? Why was he so massive?!

“LOOK AR YOU, CARROT TOP.” Jinta’s booming voice spoke; Ichigo couldn’t even tell where it was coming from. Jinta moved to pinch Ichigo between two of his fingers. Ichigo watched as two gigantic walls of peach-colored flesh appeared on either side of him. Slowly the walls came together until Ichigo was compressed between them. It was amazing how, despite the immeasurable size difference between them, Jinta could still hold Ichigo between his fingers without popping him. “YOU’RE EVEN SMALLER THAN YOU WERE BEFORE YOU TURNED INTO THE ORANGE HULK!”

“H-h-how…?”

“HOW? DON’T ASK SUCH A STUPID QUESTION, CARROT TOP. I JUST SLIPPED PAST YOU AND GREW UNNOTICED. YOU NEVER EVEN NOTICED ME BEHIND YOU.”

Ichigo didn’t understand. How did Jinta travel from under his foot to behind him in such a short time? The answer hit Ichigo like a ton of (solar system sized) bricks; Jinta’s space tearing ability. His cheap, freaking space tearing ability.

“NOW, I’M REALLY LOOKING FORWARD TO TEACHING YOU A LESSON, SO LET’S FINISH THIS.”

As soon as he finished saying this, Jinta released Ichigo who began to plummet. How was he plummeting downward in the middle of space? Jinta was using his gravity powers, of course.

“This can’t be happening!” Ichigo shouted as he fell. “I refuse to lose to this brat after all that work!” Ichigo reared back his fists and unleashed a barrage of Treachery punches upon Jinta’s chin. These punches, which had defeated his Hollow self, didn’t even register with Jinta. Ichigo wasn’t going to give up, however, and wrapped his fists with Flames of Wrath as he passed Jinta’s humongous chest. He began to beat on the god’s left pectoral, unleashing one devastating punch after another. After ten of these destructive blows, the only thing Jinta did in response was scratch an itch on his chest.

“No! No, no, no, no, no! Why won’t you just DIE?!” Sin of Lust! Pull!!” Ichigo summoned countless planets and stars and threw them all toward Jinta. Unfortunately, even the largest celestial object was smaller than a grain of salt to Jinta now. Those planets and stars never made it close to the Spirit King and were blown apart by his unmatched spiritual pressure. Jinta brought his hand to his mouth and yawned.

“FIGURES. YOU LOSE YOUR ADVANTAGE AND YOU TURN INTO A WHINY CRY BABY. I’M REALLY DISAPPOINTED IN YOU, CARROT TOP.”

Jinta moved that same hand downward and used his power of creation to form a brand new planet at his feet. This planet was the second biggest thing in the universe, being roughly half Jinta’s current size. When Ichigo turned around and saw it, he wondered how something like that could appear so suddenly. When the Hell King looked back up at the red headed brat, he saw him lift his foot over the planet…and him. Their roles were now reversed and Ichigo didn’t have any cheap space tearing powers…

“SEE YOU SOON, CARROT TOP.” Jinta spoke before he brought his foot down upon Ichigo. The Devil incarnate tried to think of some way out of this, but came up with nothing. He had so many abilities, but all of them were useless before the mega god.

Jinta sole hit Ichigo like a flyswatter hitting a fly. Most of his muscular body was crushed upon impact, but he remained alive. Jinta’s bare foot descended into the planet’s atmosphere and Ichigo’s body burst into flames. He howled in agony as his broken body began to burn turn a charcoal color. He was close to the planet’s surface non, but still the Hell king clung to life. Once his consciousness vanished…that’s when the real horror began. Death wasn’t the end…not by a long shot. Jinta would revive him, good as new, and punish him for his betrayal. He never stood a chance against Jinta…and now he was fucked.

“JJJJJJIIIIIIIIINNNNNNTTTTTAAAAAAA!!!!!”

The red haired titan’s foot impacted the planet, tearing a hole in it and smashing through layer after layer. Jinta closed his eyes and sighed as he felt every rock under his foot split and crunch. Most of all, he felt the crisp remains of Ichigo flatten and get pushed into the planet’s inner magma. Just like that, the Hell King was gone…

…sort of. Jinta still needed to get rid of that foul smelling spiritual energy. He tugged his foot out of the planet and replaced it with his hand. "Hey Ichigo! Pay attention!"

"Huh?" Ichigo looked as Tatsuki's fist was suddenly in his face, knocking him back against the mat.

Every since his mother had passed away a few weeks ago Ichigo had stopped crying, had stopped smiling, and had become a little more sullen and withdrawn. He seemed to be focusing more and more on his training, as though he was trying to get stronger for something...Tatsuki had noticed the more she fought him. He was actually getting better...but he still always got knocked down. It was like his heart wasn't in it.

In truth, he wasn't. He had never been one for fighting as much as the other kids but ever since that day...he had a single minded need to get stronger now. It was to protect his family! He needed to be strong enough to protect them from anything or anyone! Karin...Yuzu...his fath--well, he could probably take care of himself now that he thought about it. He already knew he was a pretty strong boy, physically at least. After his mother passed away he had had....moments when he would tear around his room, punching and kicking things until he wore himself out. He had actually made a dent or two in the walls, despite the fact that his fists were so small. That was one of the reasons he didn't want to fight Tatsuki or the others. He knew he was strong. The other reason was because he was afraid of losing control. Whenever his emotions got too high or his anger overwhelmed him he seemed to be possessed and went around smashing and hitting things and people. Until he got his turmoil under control, he needed to be calm.

Another fifteen minutes went by and then class was over. Ichigo pulled on his coat and headed out the door. He had requested that he be allowed to walk home by himself after his mother died and his father had decided to allow it. It was one of the ways he was getting over her death. He sighed and stared at the ground as he walked. Little did he know that something very strange was about to happen to him.

When he was about halfway home he heard a horrible beeping sound. He looked up and saw a truck speeding down the road, heading the opposite way he was moving. Well, I believe the title says it all. One of the guys, or maybe a few of the guys from the anime series Bleach, begin to grow. 1. No girls. I'm not saying they can't be there, just not as giants.

2. No toilet stuff please.

3. No hard vore.

4. Keep the sex, if any, to a minimum.

5. No limits. I don't care how big they are, as long as there is still interaction.

6. I ask that if you add to this story, you are descriptive regarding the growth process. (Clothes ripping, feet growing, etc)

Anything else goes! If you can, add!
